1_CD ._.

2_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT most_RBS recent_JJ work_NN on_IN ganja_NN (_( Dr._NNP Prain_NNP 's_POS report_NN of_IN 21st_CD June_NNP 1893_CD )_) it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN ``_`` in_IN India_NNP three_CD narcotic_JJ articles_NNS are_VBP obtained_VBN naturally_RB from_IN hemp_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP ,_, siddhi_JJ or_CC bhang_NN ,_, charas_NNS ,_, and_CC ganja_NN ._.
``_`` They_PRP are_VBP thus_RB defined_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Prain_NNP :_: ``_`` Siddhi_NNP ,_, bhang_NN ,_, subji_NN or_CC patti_NNS are_VBP different_JJ names_NNS applied_VBN to_TO the_DT dry_JJ leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, whether_IN male_NN or_CC female_NN and_CC whether_IN cultivated_VBN or_CC uncultivated_VBN ._.
``_`` Charas_NNP is_VBZ the_DT name_NN applied_VBD to_TO the_DT resinous_JJ matter_NN which_WDT forms_VBZ the_DT active_JJ principle_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN when_WRB collected_VBN separately_RB ._.
``_`` Ganja_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT dried_JJ flowering_NN tops_NNS of_IN cultivated_JJ female_JJ hemp_NN plants_NNS which_WDT have_VBP become_VBN coated_VBN with_IN resin_NN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN having_VBG been_VBN unable_JJ to_TO set_VB seeds_NNS freely_RB ._.
The_DT formation_NN of_IN seeds_NNS is_VBZ prevented_VBN by_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT male_NN plants_NNS ._.
``_`` Three_CD varieties_NNS of_IN ganja_NN are_VBP sold_VBN ,_, Ganja_NNP is_VBZ usually_RB manufactured_VBN by_IN being_VBG trodden_JJ under_IN foot_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT agglutinated_JJ flower-tops_JJ assume_NN a_DT flattened_JJ shape_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ 'Flat_JJ ganja_NN ,_, '_'' The_DT other_JJ sort_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ not_RB trodden_JJ ,_, but_CC rolled_VBD under_IN foot_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT agglutinated_JJ flower-tops_NNS are_VBP less_RBR closely_RB adherent_JJ ,_, and_CC assume_VB a_DT rounded_JJ shape_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ 'Round_JJ ganja_NN ,_, '_'' The_DT flower-tops_NNS of_IN ganja_NN detached_VBN from_IN the_DT twigs_NNS ,_, whether_IN of_IN flat_JJ or_CC of_IN round_NN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN the_DT detachment_NN has_VBZ been_VBN accidental_JJ or_CC deliberate_NN ,_, form_NN 'chur_NNP '_POS or_CC 'Broken_VBN ganja_NN ._. '_''
``_`` May_NNP these_DT definitions_NNS be_VB accepted_VBN for_IN your_PRP$ pro-_JJ vince_NN ?_.
By_IN what_WP name_NN is_VBZ each_DT of_IN these_DT products_NNS locally_RB known_VBN ?_.

1_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN the_DT HON'BLE_NNP MR._NNP T._NNP D._NNP MACKENZIE_NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP of_IN Customs_NNP ,_, Salt_NNP ,_, Abkari_NNP and_CC Opium_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
Question_NN 1.2_CD say_VBP what_WDT measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN by_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ._.
Hitherto_NNP the_DT matter_NN has_VBZ not_RB attracted_VBN attention_NN ._.
I_PRP base_VBP my_PRP$ opinion_NN of_IN the_DT injurious_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN on_IN the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT understood_JJ fact_NN that_IN violent_JJ crimes_NNS are_VBP committed_VBN under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, i.e._NN ,_, by_IN people_NNS who_WP have_VBP primed_VBN themselves_PRP with_IN them_PRP ._.
But_CC I_PRP am_VBP not_RB able_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT statistics_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO insanity_NN are_VBP trustworthy_JJ ;_: nor_CC have_VBP I_PRP ,_, in_IN twenty-_JJ eight_CD years_NNS '_POS experience_NN ,_, personally_RB come_VBN across_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN violent_JJ crime_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN ._.
The_DT Collector_NNP is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT excise_JJ administration_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
He_PRP does_VBZ not_RB visit_VB the_DT ganja_NN shops_VBZ with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN seeing_VBG the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ;_: nor_CC does_VBZ he_PRP collect_VB the_DT social_JJ wrecks_NNS caused_VBN by_IN the_DT drugs_NNS for_IN purposes_NNS of_IN inspection_NN ._.
I_PRP know_VBP of_IN no_DT general_JJ instructions_NNS issued_VBN by_IN Government_NNP to_TO undertake_VB such_JJ inspection_NN ;_: nor_CC ,_, previous_JJ to_TO this_DT Commission_NNP ,_, were_VBD any_DT steps_NNS taken_VBN to_TO cause_VB medi-_JJ cal_JJ men_NNS to_TO inform_VB themselves_PRP of_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ._.
Since_IN restriction_NN must_MD proceed_VB on_IN a_DT knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ certainly_RB the_DT duty_NN of_IN Government_NNP to_TO satisfy_VB itself_PRP as_IN to_TO these_DT effects_NNS before_IN introducing_VBG any_DT restric-_JJ tion_NN of_IN a_DT prohibitive_JJ character_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT past_JJ action_NN of_IN Government_NNP there_EX may_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT desire_NN to_TO protect_VB the_DT morals_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ;_: but_CC Government_NNP action_NN has_VBZ been_VBN prompted_VBN principally_RB by_IN the_DT right_NN to_TO derive_VB revenue_NN from_IN this_DT source_NN ._.
The_DT drugs_NNS are_VBP reputed_VBN to_TO stimulate_VB and_CC afterwards_NNS to_TO intoxicate_VB ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB seen_VBN any_DT one_CD intoxicated_VBN from_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN plenty_NN of_IN natives_NNS intoxicated_VBN by_IN toddy_NN or_CC country_NN spirit_NN ._.
Intoxication_NN is_VBZ not_RB harmless_JJ ._.
I_PRP nevertheless_RB regard_VBD the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS as_IN more_RBR injurious_JJ ,_, because_IN they_PRP are_VBP by_IN repute_NN more_JJR maddening_NN and_CC more_RBR productive_JJ of_IN crime_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Kolaba_NNP Asylum_NNP returns_NNS there_RB appear_VBP seventy-_JJ two_CD admissions_NNS from_IN spirit_NN drinking_NN and_CC sixty-_JJ two_CD from_IN hemp_JJ drugs_NNS during_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS from_IN 1888_CD to_TO 1892_CD ._.
As_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN consumers_NNS of_IN alcohol_NN is_VBZ much_RB the_DT larger_JJR ,_, the_DT proportion_NN of_IN in-_JJ sanity_NN would_MD tell_VB against_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB make_VB any_DT distinction_NN between_IN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, bhang_NN and_CC charas_NNS ._.
Charas_NNS in_IN this_DT presi-_JJ dency_NN is_VBZ hardly_RB used_VBN at_IN all_DT ,_, and_CC ganja_NN is_VBZ ,_, accord-_JJ ing_NN to_TO my_PRP$ information_NN ,_, worse_JJR than_IN bhang_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP the_DT taxation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS in_IN this_DT presidency_NN might_MD be_VB raised_VBN ;_: but_CC the_DT question_NN would_MD require_VB detailed_JJ and_CC careful_JJ examination_NN ._.
The_DT ganja_NN of_IN this_DT presidency_NN is_VBZ roughly_RB manufac-_JJ tured_JJ ,_, though_IN the_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ careful_JJ enough_RB ._.
Referring_VBG to_TO paragraph_VB 10_CD of_IN my_PRP$ memorandum_NN ,_, I_PRP regard_VBP the_DT revenue_NN assessment_NN as_IN disposing_NN of_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN taxation_NN as_IN regards_NNS the_DT cultivators_NNS ._.
A_DT direct_JJ tax_NN would_MD necessitate_VB the_DT adoption_NN of_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN distinct_JJ wholesale_JJ vend_NN ._.
I_PRP see_VBP no_DT objection_NN to_TO that_DT as_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT tax_NN does_VBZ not_RB fall_VB on_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS ._.
The_DT variations_NNS in_IN the_DT retail_JJ price_NN shown_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 8_CD of_IN my_PRP$ memorandum_NN are_VBP no_DT doubt_NN excessive_JJ ,_, and_CC seem_VBP to_TO indicate_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ room_NN for_IN taxation_NN to_TO regulate_VB the_DT whole-_JJ sale_NN value_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB noted_VBN that_IN the_DT cheap_JJ rates_NNS prevail_VBP in_IN districts_NNS where_WRB the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ cultivated_VBN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP reasonable_JJ that_IN the_DT consumers_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN cultivation_NN should_MD get_VB the_DT drug_NN somewhat_RB cheaper_JJR than_IN con-_JJ sumers_NNS at_IN a_DT distance_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT maximum_NN of_IN possession_NN (_( 40_CD tolas_NNS )_) might_MD be_VB very_RB materially_RB reduced_VBN ._.
I_PRP certainly_RB do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN this_DT sort_NN of_IN restriction_NN is_VBZ ineffectual_JJ ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN found_VBN so_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN opium_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT con-_JJ sumption_NN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS in_IN the_DT mufassal_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB prohibited_VBN if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO exist_VB ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB the_DT provision_NN in_IN clause_NN 6_CD of_IN the_DT license_NN Form_NNP A_NNP ,_, sanctioned_VBN with_IN Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
4421_CD ,_, dated_VBD 23rd_CD August_NNP 1880_CD ,_, results_NNS in_IN causing_VBG the_DT markets_NNS to_TO be_VB flooded_VBN by_IN the_DT outgoing_JJ contractor_NN with_IN the_DT drugs_NNS sold_VBN at_IN a_DT ruinously_RB cheap_JJ rate_NN ._.
The_DT man_NN has_VBZ sense_VBN enough_RB to_TO avoid_VB laying_NN in_IN a_DT very_RB large_JJ stock_NN of_IN a_DT perish-_JJ able_JJ article_NN ._.
The_DT large_JJ contract_NN system_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP advocated_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 11_CD of_IN my_PRP$ memorandum_NN ,_, has_VBZ the_DT advantage_NN that_IN it_PRP enlists_VBZ the_DT farmer_NN in_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN excise_NN ._.
Government_NNP has_VBZ a_DT respon-_JJ sible_JJ man_NN to_TO deal_VB with_IN ,_, who_WP is_VBZ more_JJR to_TO be_VB trusted_VBN than_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN petty_JJ shop-keepers_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ that_IN Government_NNP should_MD exer-_VB cise_NN the_DT supervision_NN over_IN the_DT drugs_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN clause_NN 5_CD of_IN Form_NNP A_NNP ._.

18_CD ._.

54_CD ._.
No_DT ._.

55_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP and_CC bhang_NN in_IN their_PRP$ pure_NN state_NN are_VBP not_RB generally_RB employed_VBN by_IN criminals_NNS in_IN inducing_VBG their_PRP$ victims_NNS to_TO partake_VB of_IN them_PRP to_TO further_VB their_PRP$ criminal_JJ designs_NNS ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP A._NNP H._NNP PLUNKETT_NNP ,_, City_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
My_PRP$ service_NN extends_VBZ over_RP a_DT period_NN of_IN 41_CD years_NNS ,_, during_IN which_WDT time_NN I_PRP have_VBP served_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Sind_NNP ,_, Dharwar_NNP ,_, Thana_NNP ,_, Nasik_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP ._.

From_IN 1873-74_JJ to_TO 1882-83_JJ statistics_NNS are_VBP not_RB available_JJ ;_: in_IN 1883-84_CD the_DT area_NN under_IN cultivation_NN was_VBD 24_CD acres_NNS ,_, 10_CD and_CC 19_CD acres_NNS in_IN two_CD succeeding_VBG years_NNS ,_, 35_CD and_CC 30_CD acres_NNS in_IN 1886-87_JJ and_CC 1887-.88_JJ ,_, and_CC 16_CD to_TO 17_CD acres_NNS for_IN the_DT three_CD succeeding_VBG years_NNS respectively_RB ._.

9_CD ._.
The_DT method_NN followed_VBD in_IN cultivating_VBG the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN may_MD be_VB described_VBN briefly_IN as_IN under_IN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT difficulty_NN felt_VBD in_IN the_DT selection_NN of_IN land_NN ._.

The_DT land_NN is_VBZ ploughed_VBN well_RB three_CD or_CC four_CD times_NNS ._.
The_DT first_JJ ,_, ploughing_VBG takes_VBZ place_NN in_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP ,_, when_WRB ordinarily_RB agricultural_JJ lands_NNS are_VBP prepared_JJ ._.
The_DT soil_NN is_VBZ thus_RB well_RB prepared_VBN by_IN two_CD to_TO three_CD courses_NNS of_IN ploughing_NN ._.
The_DT rains_NNS are_VBP await-_JJ ed_NN ._.
In_IN June_NNP when_WRB the_DT land_NN is_VBZ once_RB or_CC twice_RB flooded_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ again_RB ploughed_JJ and_CC harrowed_VBD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ then_RB manured_VBN with_IN cow-dung_NN and_CC rubbish_NN ,_, also_RB with_IN ashes_NNS in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ._.
After_IN another_DT fall_NN of_IN rain_NN ,_, the_DT land_NN is_VBZ once_RB more_JJR harrowed_JJ and_CC the_DT soil_NN is_VBZ then_RB quite_RB ready_JJ to_TO receive_VB the_DT seed_NN ._.
About_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN June_NNP the_DT seed_NN is_VBZ sown_VBN ,_, which_WDT appears_VBZ well_RB within_IN a_DT week_NN ._.
The_DT plants_NNS are_VBP then_RB thinned_VBN if_IN they_PRP come_VBP up_RB too_RB closely_RB and_CC are_VBP kept_VBN carefully_RB weeded_VBN ._.
If_IN the_DT rains_NNS are_VBP seasonable_JJ ,_, no_DT watering_NN is_VBZ required_VBN ,_, otherwise_RB one_CD or_CC two_CD waterings_NNS are_VBP given_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ a_DT little_JJ over_IN a_DT foot_NN high_JJ ,_, the_DT lower_JJR twigs_NNS are_VBP cut_VBN off_RP so_RB as_IN to_TO favour_VB a_DT more_RBR healthy_JJ growth_NN of_IN the_DT tops_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS ._.

This_DT process_NN over_IN ,_, weeding_VBG if_IN necessary_JJ is_VBZ repeated_VBN ._.

10_CD ._.

11_CD ._.
No_DT ._.

I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO say_VB if_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ impossible_JJ in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN heavy_JJ rainfall_NN ,_, a_DT damp_JJ climate_NN ,_, and_CC hilly_RB tracts_NNS are_VBP not_RB favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
My_PRP$ reply_NN to_TO question_NN 7_CD shows_NNS that_IN in_IN this_DT district_NN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ limited_VBN to_TO about_IN 17_CD acres_NNS ._.
The_DT products_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN are_VBP comparatively_RB small_JJ ._.
The_DT yield_NN is_VBZ about_IN 153_CD maunds_NNS of_IN ganja_NN and_CC as_IN much_JJ of_IN bhang_NN ._.
No_DT reliable_JJ statistics_NNS are_VBP available_JJ on_IN this_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN able_JJ as_IN yet_RB to_TO obtain_VB trustworthy_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT average_JJ annual_JJ out-_JJ turn_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT two_CD products_NNS of_IN bhang_NN and_CC ganja_NN during_IN past_JJ years_NNS ;_: but_CC from_IN enquiries_NNS made_VBN locally_RB I_PRP learn_VBP an_DT acre_NN gives_VBZ an_DT average_JJ yield_NN of_IN 9_CD maunds_NNS of_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT two_CD products_NNS ._.
The_DT out-_JJ turn_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC of_IN bhang_NN may_MD in_IN this_DT district_NN therefore_RB be_VB taken_VBN at_IN 9_CD maunds_NNS per_IN acre_NN ._.
The_DT drugs_NNS are_VBP locally_RB manufactured_VBN in_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Indapur_NNP ,_, Bhimthari_NNP ,_, Sirur_NNP and_CC in_IN Haveli_NNP taluka_NN ,_, in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.

15_CD ._.
The_DT wild_JJ plant_NN is_VBZ not_RB found_VBN in_IN this_DT district_NN ,_, nor_CC is_VBZ it_PRP obtained_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN manufacturing_VBG drugs_NNS therefrom_NN ._.
The_DT cultivated_JJ plant_NN only_RB is_VBZ available_JJ ._.
As_IN stated_VBN in_IN replies_NNS to_TO previous_JJ questions_NNS ,_, ganja_NN and_CC bhang_NN in_IN this_DT province_NN are_VBP produced_VBN from_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ plant_NN ._.
The_DT flowering_NN tops_VBZ supply_NN ganja_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT leaves_NNS and_CC residue_NN of_IN the_DT flowers_NNS ,_, bhang_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT seed_NN is_VBZ sown_VBN in_IN June_NNP ,_, it_PRP matures_VBZ in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN November_NNP ,_, about_IN the_DT Dewali_NNP holi-_JJ days_NNS ,_, The_DT state_NN of_IN maturity_NN is_VBZ indicated_VBN by_IN a_DT brownish_JJ appearance_NN of_IN the_DT crop_NN and_CC falling_VBG down_IN of_IN all_PDT the_DT larger_JJR leaves_NNS ._.
The_DT cultivator_NN then_RB makes_VBZ his_PRP$ arrangements_NNS for_IN reaping_VBG the_DT crop_NN and_CC preparing_VBG the_DT drug_NN ,_, a_DT piece_NN of_IN ground_NN is_VBZ prepared_JJ and_CC cleared_VBN of_IN stubble_JJ and_CC grass_NN and_CC made_VBD quite_RB even_RB ._.
The_DT ordinary_JJ threshing_NN ground_NN (_( Khale_NNP )_) serves_VBZ the_DT purpose_NN ._.
The_DT ground_NN being_VBG prepared_VBN ,_, the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN up_RP generally_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN ._.
The_DT flower_NN tops_NNS are_VBP cut_VBN with_IN a_DT scythe_NN ,_, the_DT leaves_NNS are_VBP pulled_VBN off_RP by_IN hand_NN ._.
The_DT crop_NN collected_VBD is_VBZ stacked_VBN in_IN the_DT threshing_NN ground_NN and_CC is_VBZ trodden_VBN over_IN in_IN the_DT afternoon_NN ;_: as_IN evening_VBG sets_NNS in_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN treading_NN is_VBZ suspended_VBN ,_, leaving_VBG the_DT stalks_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, on_IN the_DT ground_NN for_IN exposure_NN to_TO the_DT dew_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT following_JJ day_NN the_DT process_NN of_IN treading_NN is_VBZ resumed_VBN until_IN the_DT quantity_NN 30_CD so_RB trodden_JJ on_IN becomes_NNS flat_JJ ,_, when_WRB a_DT second_JJ layer_NN of_IN flowering_VBG tops_NNS and_CC leaves_VBZ is_VBZ brought_VBN in_IN and_CC pressed_JJ and_CC trampled_VBD on_IN ;_: a_DT third_JJ and_CC fourth_JJ layer_NN is_VBZ formed_VBN until_IN the_DT mass_NN rises_VBZ a_DT foot_NN high_JJ ._.
The_DT treading_NN is_VBZ required_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO produce_VB flat_JJ sheaves_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ easily_RB accomplished_VBN by_IN the_DT resinous_JJ secretion_NN which_WDT the_DT plant_NN and_CC its_PRP$ flowers_NNS contain_VBP ._.
The_DT exudation_NN so_RB produced_JJ adheres_NNS to_TO the_DT crushed_VBN leaves_NNS and_CC flowers_NNS and_CC pro-_JJ duces_NNS a_DT mass_NN ._.
This_DT process_NN is_VBZ repeated_VBN for_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD consecutive_JJ days_NNS ,_, by_IN which_WDT time_NN the_DT pro-_JJ duct_NN gets_VBZ dry_JJ ._.
The_DT small_JJ twigs_NNS are_VBP thrown_VBN away_RB ,_, ganja_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN ,_, the_DT broken_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC residue_NN of_IN the_DT ganja_NN is_VBZ also_RB separately_RB collected_VBN ._.
Seed_VB if_IN any_DT is_VBZ picked_VBN up_IN and_CC stored_VBD ,_, ganja_FW thus_RB made_VBN is_VBZ then_RB packed_VBN in_IN bales_NNS ,_, the_DT broken_JJ leaves_NNS and_CC the_DT small_JJ bits_NNS detached_VBN from_IN ganja_NN in_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN manufacture_NN are_VBP separately_RB packed_VBN ,_, and_CC supply_VB what_WP is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN bhang_NN in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.
This_DT preparation_NN should_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN ``_`` chur_NN ''_'' (_( broken_JJ ganja_NN )_) ,_, but_CC in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ sold_VBN as_IN bhang_NN ._.
The_DT cutting_NN is_VBZ usually_RB done_VBN by_IN women_NNS and_CC the_DT trampling_NN by_IN men_NNS ._.
The_DT women_NNS work_VBP from_IN 7_CD to_TO 11_CD A.M._NNP ,_, the_DT men_NNS from_IN 1_CD to_TO 6_CD P.M._NNP ,_, with_IN several_JJ intermissions_NNS ._.
Both_DT ganja_NN and_CC ``_`` chur_NN ''_'' are_VBP used_VBN for_IN smoking_NN ._.
The_DT latter_JJ however_RB rarely_RB ._.
``_`` Chur_NNP ''_'' or_CC ``_`` bhang_NN ''_'' is_VBZ mostly_RB used_VBN for_IN drinking_NN ;_: ganja_NN is_VBZ also_RB used_VBN for_IN preparing_VBG some_DT of_IN the_DT narcotic_JJ preparations_NNS usually_RB used_VBN for_IN eating_NN ._.

33_CD ._.

39_CD ._.

(_( a_DT )_) Ganja_NNP stimulates_VBZ appetite_RB for_IN food_NN and_CC aids_NNS digestion_NN to_TO some_DT extent_NN ._.

I_PRP am_VBP not_RB in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT reply_NN to_TO clause_VB (_( d_NN )_) ._.

42_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB prepared_JJ to_TO make_VB a_DT reply_NN ._.
43_CD ._.

During_IN a_DT long_JJ official_JJ career_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT nearly_RB thirty_VBP years_NNS have_VBP been_VBN passed_VBN as_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB met_VBN with_IN a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN intoxication_NN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS from_IN ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT prosecution_NN for_IN disorderly_JJ behaviour_NN in_IN public_JJ from_IN intoxica-_JJ tion_NN from_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ._.
44_CD ._.
The_DT immediate_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS on_IN the_DT habitual_JJ consumer_NN is_VBZ to_TO produce_VB slight_JJ exhilaration_NN and_CC pleasant_JJ sensa-_JJ tions_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ refreshing_VBG ._.

45_CD ._.
The_DT habitual_JJ moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS produces_VBZ noxious_JJ effects_NNS ,_, physical_JJ especially_RB ._.
Ganja_NNP smoking_NN especially_RB has_VBZ bad_JJ effects_NNS ._.
It_PRP weakens_VBZ the_DT constitution_NN and_CC emaciates_VBZ the_DT body_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ continued_VBN use_NN impairs_VBZ the_DT digestion_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT first_JJ use_NN of_IN it_PRP excites_VBZ appetite_RB ._.

46_CD ._.
The_DT habitual_JJ excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS produces_VBZ noxious_JJ effects_NNS and_CC in_IN an_DT aggrava-_JJ ted_JJ form_NN ._.

1_CD ._.

51_CD ._.

55_CD ._.
Yes_UH ._.
I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN cases_NNS in_IN Ahmedabad_NNP in_IN which_WDT a_DT gang_NN was_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN a_DT conspiracy_NN to_TO rob_VB unsuspecting_JJ travellers_NNS and_CC other_JJ innocent_JJ persons_NNS ._.

Immediately_RB afterwards_IN the_DT victim_NN was_VBD robbed_VBN and_CC the_DT gang_NN decamped_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ goods_NNS ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP can_MD form_VB a_DT judg-_JJ ment_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP complete_JJ stupefac-_JJ tion_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB induced_VBN by_IN this_DT drug_NN without_IN any_DT admixture_NN ._.
21_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN RAO_NNP BAHADUR_NNP LALLUBHAI_NNP GORDHANDAS_NNP ,_, Vania_NNP ,_, Huzur_NNP Deputy_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Nasik_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
My_PRP$ employment_NN as_IN personal_JJ assistant_NN to_TO the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Abkari_NNP from_IN 1880_CD to_TO 1887_CD has_VBZ enabled_VBN me_PRP to_TO become_VB acquainted_JJ with_IN the_DT de-_JJ tails_NNS of_IN administration_NN ,_, taxation_NN ,_, and_CC control_NN ._.
My_PRP$ information_NN and_CC my_PRP$ conclusions_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP have_VBP formed_VBN them_PRP ,_, concerning_VBG the_DT use_NN and_CC effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drugs_NNS ,_, are_VBP derived_VBN from_IN general_JJ observa-_JJ tion_NN ._.

(_( 1_CD )_) Bhang_NNP ,_, sabji_NN or_CC mayapani_NN is_VBZ made_VBN from_IN the_DT flower_NN leaves_VBZ and_CC the_DT seed_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.

The_DT preparation_NN is_VBZ now_RB ready_JJ to_TO be_VB drunk_NN ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) Yakuti_NN or_CC majum_NN is_VBZ bhang_VBN boiled_VBN in_IN clarified_JJ butter_NN ._.
The_DT clarified_JJ butter_NN is_VBZ flavoured_VBN with_IN sugar_NN and_CC spices_NNS and_CC is_VBZ often_RB coloured_VBN with_IN vermillion_NN and_CC saffron_NN ._.

2_CD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
3_CD a_DT month_NN ._.
This_DT drug_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN professional_JJ dealers_NNS called_VBD majum-_JJ walas_NNS ,_, chiefly_NN Banias_NNP by_IN caste_NN ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) Ganja_NNP is_VBZ the_DT dried_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN which_WDT has_VBZ flowered_VBN and_CC from_IN which_WDT the_DT resin_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN removed_VBN ._.

40_CD 3_CD ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ cultivated_VBN to_TO a_DT very_RB small_JJ extent_NN in_IN Surat_NNP and_CC Broach_NNP (_( about_IN thirty-five_JJ acres_NNS in_IN all_DT )_) ._.
The_DT plant_NN does_VBZ not_RB grow_VB spontaneously_RB ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ cultivated_VBN like_IN cereals_NNS ,_, i.e._FW ,_, jawari_NN and_CC bajri_NN ,_, and_CC harvested_VBD in_IN November_NNP and_CC February_NNP ,_, as_IN is_VBZ the_DT case_NN with_IN kharif_NN and_CC rabi_NN crops_NNS ._.

Question_NN 1.58_CD brought_NN from_IN Nagar_NNP in_IN the_DT Ahmednagar_NNP District_NNP ._.
It_PRP also_RB can_MD be_VB had_VBN in_IN the_DT ganja-producing_JJ villages_NNS of_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
The_DT seed_NN is_VBZ of_IN blue_JJ colour_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN form_NN resembles_VBZ the_DT Argad_NNP seed_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ little_JJ flat-_JJ tened_VBN ._.

32_CD ._.

Appendix_NNP A._NN GANJA_NNP PREPARATIONS_NNP ._.
Eating_NN ._.
I.76_NNP His_PRP$ definition_NN of_IN charas_NN is_VBZ correct_JJ ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ the_DT resinous_JJ gummy_NN matter_NN which_WDT sticks_VBZ to_TO the_DT scythe_NN or_CC hand_NN or_CC foot_NN ,_, by_IN which_WDT the_DT top_NN flowering_NN and_CC knot_VB shoot_JJ branches_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN are_VBP cut_VBN or_CC pulled_VBN out_RP or_CC trodden_VB ._.
This_DT gummy_JJ sub-_JJ stance_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ collected_VBN together_RB and_CC converted_VBD into_IN small_JJ pills_NNS ,_, is_VBZ called_VBN charas_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR in-_JJ toxicating_NN than_IN ganja_NN ._.
The_DT definition_NN of_IN the_DT word_NN ganja_NN is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_, with_IN this_DT addition_NN ,_, that_IN not_RB only_RB the_DT dried_VBN flower-_JJ ing_NN tops_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT flower_NN bunches_VBZ that_IN shoot_NN out_RB at_IN each_DT knot_NN also_RB constitute_VBP ganja_NN when_WRB trodden_NN ._.
The_DT crumbles_NNS that_WDT are_VBP collected_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN treading_VBG down_RP the_DT flowering_NN tops_NNS and_CC knot_VB shoots_NNS together_RB with_IN their_PRP$ tiny_JJ leaves_NNS to_TO make_VB flat_JJ ganja_NN are_VBP called_VBN bhang_NN ,_, i.e._FW ,_, fragments_NNS of_IN the_DT ganja_NN ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, bhang_JJ and_CC ganja_NN are_VBP almost_RB one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ in_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP ._.

9_CD ._.

It_PRP grows_VBZ in_IN dry_JJ crop_NN land_NN also_RB ,_, pro-_JJ vided_VBD the_DT fall_NN of_IN rain_NN be_VB seasonable_JJ and_CC plentiful_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN growing_VBG luxuriantly_RB in_IN an_DT irrigated_JJ field_NN of_IN whitish_JJ gaonthan_NN land_NN belonging_VBG to_TO a_DT Brahmin_NNP gentleman_NN surnamed_VBD Tadpatri_NNP in_IN the_DT Rahuri_NNP taluka_NN of_IN the_DT Ahmed-_NNP nagar_NN Collectorate_NNP ,_, twenty_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, while_IN Assistant_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP also_RB seen_VBN it_PRP growing_VBG in_IN black_JJ and_CC reddish_JJ sails_NNS in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Collectorate_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Aundh_NNP State_NNP ._.
The_DT lands_NNS selected_VBN for_IN the_DT hemp_NN cultivation_NN are_VBP ploughed_VBN and_CC harrowed_VBN in_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN February_NNP and_CC March_NNP and_CC manured_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ._.
Twenty-five_JJ cart-loads_NNS of_IN manure_NN are_VBP required_VBN for_IN each_DT acre_NN ._.
The_DT seed_NN used_VBN is_VBZ from_IN the_DT Nagar_NNP Collectorate_NNP generally_RB ,_, because_IN it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO produce_VB a_DT smaller_JJR number_NN of_IN male_JJ plants_NNS or_CC to_TO give_VB rise_NN to_TO a_DT smaller_JJR number_NN of_IN the_DT plagues_NNS hereinafter_RBR men-_JJ tioned_VBN ._.
The_DT hemp_NN seed_NN is_VBZ like_IN múg_NN seed_NN ,_, and_CC can_MD be_VB had_VBN at_IN one_CD seer_NN of_IN 80_CD tolas_NNS per_IN rupee_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ sown_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN July_NNP generally_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ reaped_VBN in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN November_NNP or_CC December_NNP ._.
It_PRP commences_VBZ to_TO grow_VB within_IN a_DT week_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT plants_NNS grow_VBP thicker_IN they_PRP are_VBP thinned_VBN ,_, and_CC only_RB those_DT at_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN one_CD inch_NN apart_RB are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO stand_VB ._.
In_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT crop_NN may_MD not_RB be_VB thick_JJ ,_, two_CD of_IN the_DT three_CD holes_NNS of_IN the_DT sowing_NN machine_NN intended_VBN for_IN the_DT passage_NN of_IN the_DT seed_NN are_VBP blocked_VBN up_RP at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN sowing_NN ._.
From_IN one_CD and_CC a_DT quarter_NN to_TO two_CD seers_NNS of_IN seed_NN are_VBP required_VBN for_IN an_DT acre_NN ._.
The_DT plants_NNS are_VBP one_CD foot_NN high_JJ within_IN a_DT month_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP weeded_VBN and_CC the_DT task_NN of_IN rooting_VBG out_RP the_DT male_NN plant_NN or_CC plants_NNS affected_VBN with_IN plague_NN follows_VBZ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT difficult_JJ task_NN to_TO find_VB ._.
out_IN male_JJ plants_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PRP can_MD generally_RB be_VB recognized_VBN by_IN the_DT small_JJ pin-like_JJ white_JJ flower_NN growing_VBG in_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT bunches_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ ripe_JJ and_CC in_IN the_DT shoots_NNS when_WRB young_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ also_RB called_VBN the_DT andya_NN plague_NN ._.
The_DT Mamlatdar_NNP of_IN Khanapur_NNP informs_NNS me_PRP that_IN there_EX are_VBP other_JJ five_CD kinds_NNS of_IN plagues_NNS for_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN called_VBN (_( 1_CD )_) shevarya_NN ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) haldya_NN ,_, (_( 3_CD )_) kapshia_NN ,_, (_( 4_CD )_) pundia_NN ,_, (_( 5_CD )_) mora_NN ,_, the_DT plants_NNS affected_VBN by_IN which_WDT are_VBP required_VBN to_TO be_VB carefully_RB rooted_VBN out_RP in_IN due_JJ time_NN ._.
The_DT shevarya_NN plague_NN is_VBZ recognized_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT branches_NNS growing_VBG higher_JJR and_CC bending_VBG down_RP with_IN a_DT jowari-like_JJ grain_NN flower_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT haldya_NN plague_NN is_VBZ recognized_VBN by_IN a_DT yellow_JJ shoot_NN at_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT knots_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.
The_DT kapshia_NN and_CC pundia_NN plagues_NNS can_MD be_VB recognized_VBN by_IN a_DT jowari-like_JJ grain_NN on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.
It_PRP transforms_VBZ afterwards_NNS into_IN a_DT white_JJ or_CC yellow_JJ flower_NN ._.
The_DT mora_NN plague_NN ,_, recognized_VBN by_IN the_DT yellow_JJ flower_NN in_IN the_DT top_JJ bunch_NN ,_, makes_VBZ its_PRP$ appearance_NN sometimes_RB fifteen_JJ days_NNS prior_RB to_TO the_DT reaping_NN of_IN the_DT crop_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ the_DT effect_NN of_IN destroying_VBG the_DT better_JJR quality_NN of_IN the_DT ganja_NN ._.
No_DT one_NN is_VBZ able_JJ to_TO recognize_VB the_DT male_NN plant_NN and_CC the_DT plagues_NNS with_IN slight_JJ observation_NN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB experts_NNS are_VBP employed_VBN ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN reaping_VBG the_DT crop_NN two_CD men_NNS are_VBP employed_VBN ,_, one_CD to_TO cut_VB the_DT flower_JJR top_JJ bunches_NNS with_IN a_DT scythe_NN ,_, and_CC another_DT man_NN to_TO pull_VB out_RP the_DT knot_NN shoot_NN bunches_NNS ._.
About_IN 520lb_CD of_IN ganja_NN are_VBP said_VBD to_TO be_VB produced_VBN in_IN an_DT acre_NN when_WRB the_DT crop_NN is_VBZ superior_JJ ._.
Exclusive_CD of_IN the_DT labour_NN of_IN the_DT cultivator_NN ,_, the_DT expense_NN of_IN producing_VBG one_CD acre_NN of_IN hemp_JJ crop_NN is_VBZ about_IN R60_NNP ,_, and_CC including_VBG the_DT cultivator_NN 's_POS labour_JJ R100_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN note_NN that_IN this_DT crop_NN is_VBZ not_RB eaten_VBN by_IN cattle_NNS ,_, but_CC by_IN sheep_JJ only_RB ,_, and_CC as_IN sheep_NN are_VBP not_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN straying_VBG anywhere_RB ,_, hemp_NN plants_NNS do_VBP not_RB require_VB hedging_VBG generally_RB ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT agricultural_JJ cultivators_NNS are_VBP the_DT very_JJ persons_NNS who_WP cultivate_VBP hemp_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT wild_JJ ._.
hemp_NN plant_NN in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Collectorate_NNP ._.
12_CD ._.
Wild_JJ hemp_NN is_VBZ nowhere_RB especially_RB cultivated_VBN in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP district_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ not_RB restricted_VBN in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Collectorate_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Aundh_NNP State_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT doubt_NN on_IN this_DT point_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD cleared_VBN by_IN the_DT High_NNP Court_NNP ruling_NN ,_, dated_VBD 15th_CD November_NNP 1888_CD ,_, to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN the_DT mere_JJ cultivation_NN of_IN hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ not_RB punishable_JJ under_IN section_NN 43_CD of_IN the_DT Abkari_NNP Act_NNP ,_, V_NNP of_IN 1878_CD ._.
The_DT manufacture_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN into_IN ganja_NN ,_, bhang_NN and_CC charas_VB alone_RB requires_VBZ a_DT license_NN ._.
The_DT sale_NN and_CC export_NN are_VBP also_RB covered_VBN with_IN passes_NNS ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN is_VBZ not_RB common_JJ to_TO all_DT districts_NNS ,_, nor_CC are_VBP ali_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN culti-_JJ vating_NN hemp_NN ._.
Such_JJ of_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS only_RB as_IN find_VB it_PRP profitable_JJ cultivate_NN it_PRP ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN is_VBZ impossible_JJ any-_JJ where_WRB ._.
It_PRP can_MD be_VB produced_VBN in_IN all_DT garden_NN lands_NNS ._.
14_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP ,_, charas_NN and_CC bhang_NN are_VBP prepared_VBN in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Collectorate_NNP by_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS thereof_VBP ._.
The_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN will_MD be_VB known_VBN from_IN the_DT statement_NN furnished_VBD through_IN the_DT Collector_NNP ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT top_JJ bunches_NNS and_CC the_DT knot_NN bunches_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN are_VBP trodden_VBN separately_RB ,_, because_IN they_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB trodden_VBN together_RB properly_RB ._.
The_DT process_NN of_IN treading_VBG goes_VBZ on_IN till_IN the_DT bunches_NNS are_VBP completely_RB flattened_VBN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN ganja_NN ._.
The_DT process_NN of_IN preparing_VBG charas_NNS is_VBZ simple_JJ ._.
The_DT charas_NN is_VBZ the_DT resinous_JJ gummy_JJ matter_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT scythe_NN or_CC the_DT hand_NN or_CC foot_NN becomes_NNS besmeared_VBN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN cutting_VBG or_CC pulling_VBG out_RP or_CC treading_VBG the_DT flower_NN top_NN or_CC knot_VB shoot_JJ bunches_NNS ._.
This_DT matter_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN and_CC converted_VBN into_IN small_JJ pills_NNS ._.
77_CD Bhang_NNP (_( i.e._FW ,_, fragments_NNS of_IN the_DT ganja_NN )_) is_VBZ ground_JJ and_CC put_VBD into_IN milk_NN mixed_VBN up_RP with_IN cardamoms_NNS ,_, almonds_NNS ,_, poppy_JJ seed_NN ,_, sugar_NN ,_, sweet_JJ fennel_NN ,_, nutmeg_RB ,_, black_JJ pepper_NN and_CC mace_NN ,_, and_CC strained_VBD several_JJ times_NNS and_CC drunk_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN bhang_NN ghota_NN ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN smoking_VBG thus_RB :_: It_PRP is_VBZ first_RB washed_VBN ,_, until_IN it_PRP ceases_VBZ to_TO give_VB out_RP green_JJ water_NN ._.
By_IN this_DT washing_VBG process_NN it_PRP becomes_VBZ gummy_JJ ._.
One_CD tola_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO fill_VB in_IN two_CD to_TO three_CD smoking_VBG pipes_NNS ._.
As_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ put_VBN in_IN the_DT smoking_NN pipe_NN in_IN its_PRP$ wet_NN state_NN ,_, one-half_JJ tola_NN of_IN tobacco_NN is_VBZ mixed_JJ with_IN it_PRP ,_, or_CC placed_VBN above_IN and_CC below_IN it_PRP to_TO make_VB it_PRP ignite_VB ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ also_RB converted_VBN into_IN small_JJ cakes_NNS by_IN boiling_VBG it_PRP with_IN ghi_NN and_CC sugar_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN majum_NN or_CC yakuti_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ eaten_VBN ._.
There_EX are_VBP no_DT wild_JJ hemp_NN plants_NNS in_IN the_DT Deccan_NNP ._.
16_CD ._.
Ghota_NN from_IN bhang_NN for_IN drinking_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN the_DT drinkers_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ houses_NNS ._.
It_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN in_IN its_PRP$ raw_JJ state_NN wherever_NN it_PRP is_VBZ growing_VBG ._.
Ganja_NNP and_CC charas_NNS can_MD not_RB ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB prepared_VBN from_IN the_DT wild_JJ plants_NNS wherever_RB grown_VBP ._.
But_CC there_EX are_VBP no_DT such_JJ wild_JJ plants_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP already_RB stated_VBN in_IN answer_NN to_TO the_DT query_NN No_NNP ._.
14_CD that_IN charas_NNS and_CC ganja_NNS are_VBP prepared_VBN by_IN the_DT cultivators_NNS themselves_PRP ._.
Ghota_NN from_IN bhang_NN for_IN drinking_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN by_IN the_DT Gosavis_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS by_IN other_JJ people_NNS ,_, on_IN Shivaratra_NNP day_NN ._.
Ghota_NN from_IN bhang_NN is_VBZ more_RBR used_VBN by_IN all_DT classes_NNS at_IN Indore_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP ,_, charas_NN and_CC bhang_NN deteriorate_NN by_IN keeping_VBG ._.
Ganja_NNP and_CC bhang_VBD become_VBN less_RBR effective_JJ next_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC useless_RB as_IN a_DT narcotic_JJ after_IN three_CD years_NNS ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ of_IN use_NN till_IN the_DT next_JJ rains_NNS ,_, when_WRB vermin_NN commence_NN to_TO make_VB appearance_NN therein_NN and_CC dimi-_JJ nish_JJ its_PRP$ value_NN ._.
The_DT causes_NNS of_IN deterioration_NN are_VBP that_IN the_DT resinous_JJ and_CC gummy_JJ matter_NN which_WDT exists_VBZ in_IN these_DT articles_NNS dries_VBZ up_RP or_CC deteriorates_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP no_DT preventive_JJ means_NNS known_VBN here_RB ._.
19_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN smoking_VBG throughout_IN the_DT Collectorate_NNP ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ purpose_NN ,_, but_CC very_RB seldom_RB in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN its_PRP$ costliness_NN ._.
20_CD ._.
The_DT smoking_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ very_RB rare_JJ among_IN Brahmins_NNS and_CC females_NNS of_IN all_DT classes_NNS ,_, save_VBP prosti-_JJ tutes_NNS of_IN the_DT worst_JJS type_NN ,_, With_IN these_DT exceptions_NNS three_CD or_CC four_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT other_JJ classes_NNS smoke_VBD ganja_NN to_TO a_DT smaller_JJR or_CC larger_JJR extent_NN throughout_IN the_DT Collectorate_NNP ._.
Charas_NNP is_VBZ rarely_RB in_IN use_NN ,_, 21_CD ._.

22_CD ._.

No_DT importation_NN of_IN foreign_JJ charas_JJ occurs_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP know_VBP ._.
23_CD ._.

24_CD ._.
The_DT classes_NNS who_WP drink_VBP bhang_IN ghota_NN are_VBP bairagis_VBN ,_, gosavis_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN Shivaratra_NNP day_NN a_DT few_JJ more_JJR Hindus_NNP ,_, mostly_RB cooks_VBZ ,_, water-carriers_NNS ,_, song-_JJ sters_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ licentious_JJ characters_NNS ._.
This_DT kind_NN of_IN drinking_NN prevails_NNS in_IN the_DT country_NN lying_VBG north_NN of_IN the_DT Narbada_NNP river_NN ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP drink_VBP bhang_NN ghota_NN is_VBZ very_RB small_JJ ,_, i.e._JJ ,_, one_CD in_IN a_DT thousand_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Collectorate_NNP ._.
Majum_NNP or_CC yakuti_NN ,_, the_DT preparation_NN of_IN bhang_NN ,_, as_IN per_IN reply_NN to_TO query_VB No_NNP ._.
15_CD ,_, is_VBZ not_RB permitted_VBN in_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Collectorate_NNP ,_, and_CC therefore_IN it_PRP is_VBZ seldom_RB eaten_VBN ._.
25_CD ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ on_IN the_DT increase_NN for_IN the_DT following_JJ reasons:78_NN because_IN it_PRP leads_VBZ to_TO vices_NNS ._.

34_CD ._.
Habitual_JJ excessive_JJ consumers_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN gosavis_NN ,_, bairagis_NN ,_, fakirs_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, will_MD alone_VB expe-_JJ rience_NN serious_JJ privation_NN if_IN they_PRP do_VBP not_RB get_VB the_DT drug_NN ._.
Non-habitual_JJ or_CC non-excessive_JJ consumers_NNS will_MD not_RB experience_VB any_DT privation_NN ._.
They_PRP will_MD leave_VB off_RP the_DT habit_NN ._.
35_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB feasible_JJ to_TO prohibit_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN all_PDT these_DT drugs_NNS ,_, so_RB long_RB as_IN alcoholic_JJ stimuiants_NNS and_CC other_JJ drugs_NNS are_VBP freely_RB procurable_JJ ._.
Excessive_JJ liquor_NN drinkers_NNS are_VBP more_RBR formidable_JJ than_IN ganja_JJ smokers_NNS or_CC bhang_NN or_CC ghota_NN drinkers_NNS ,_, and_CC therefore_RB men_NNS who_WP want_VBP intoxication_NN may_MD have_VB ganja_NN in_IN preference_NN to_TO liquor_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO effectually_RB prohibit_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS by_IN prohibiting_VBG the_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN without_IN any_DT discontent_NN amounting_VBG to_TO a_DT political_JJ danger_NN ._.
36_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT religious_JJ objection_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB liquids_JJ pre-_NN pared_VBN by_IN other_JJ castes_NNS ;_: but_CC there_EX e_JJ ists_NNS a_DT prohibi-_JJ tion_NN regarding_VBG the_DT use_NN of_IN liquor_NN ._.
I_PRP know_VBP persons_NNS who_WP wish_VBP to_TO have_VB intoxication_NN preferring_VBG liquor_NN to_TO ganja_VB ,_, and_CC therefore_RB the_DT consumption_NN of_IN alcohol_NN is_VBZ on_IN the_DT increase_NN and_CC will_MD increase_VB as_IN the_DT ties_NNS of_IN religious_JJ bonds_NNS are_VBP becoming_VBG slackened_VBN by_IN edu-_JJ cation_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT action_NN of_IN the_DT respectable_JJ people_NNS in_IN excommunicating_VBG drinkers_NNS of_IN liquor_NN becomes_VBZ more_JJR and_CC more_RBR hampered_VBN by_IN the_DT operation_NN of_IN the_DT defamation_NN section_NN of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Penal_NNP Code_NNP ._.
37_CD ._.

38_CD ._.

39_CD ._.

The_DT smoking_NN of_IN ganja_NN affects_VBZ one_CD 's_POS brains79_NN contracts_NNS in_IN the_DT British_JJ territory_NN and_CC annas_JJ eight_CD per_IN each_DT maund_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN when_WRB exported_VBN from_IN or_CC imported_VBN into_IN a_DT Native_JJ State_NNP is_VBZ reasonable_JJ ._.
66_CD ._.
Only_RB flat_JJ ganja_NN is_VBZ produced_VBN here_RB ;_: but_CC I_PRP think_VBP there_EX should_MD be_VB no_DT different_JJ rates_NNS of_IN taxation_NN for_IN different_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN ganja_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP will_MD be_VB troublesome_JJ to_TO the_DT exporters_NNS ,_, manufacturers_NNS and_CC sellers_NNS ._.
67_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
68_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP no_DT houses_NNS or_CC shops_NNS in_IN this_DT district_NN to_TO my_PRP$ knowledge_NN for_IN the_DT consumption_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, and_CC none_NN such_JJ will_MD thrive_VB or_CC be_VB viewed_VBN with_IN favour_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT smokers_NNS or_CC drinkers_NNS still_RB drink_VB or_CC smoke_VB in_IN private_JJ ._.
69_CD ._.
I_PRP must_MD say_VB that_IN the_DT wishes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP not_RB consulted_VBN as_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB ._.
The_DT con-_JJ tractors_NNS are_VBP always_RB inclined_VBN to_TO open_VB more_JJR shops_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP make_VBP some_DT ganja_NN smokers_NNS send_VBP a_DT petition_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ complied_VBN with_IN ._.
If_IN the_DT people_NNS are_VBP told_VBN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT pernicious_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT ganja_NN smoking_NN by_IN objecting_VBG to_TO the_DT opening_NN of_IN a_DT shop_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP sure_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, as_IN non-_JJ consumers_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN form_NN a_DT majority_NN ._.
70_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
Question_NN 24.80_CD 38_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP W._NNP ALMON_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Abkari_NNP Department_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT opportunities_NNS connected_VBN with_IN my_PRP$ duties_NNS in_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP as_IN Assistant_NNP Collector_NNP ,_, Abkari_NNP Department_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT definitions_NNS given_VBN may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN ._.
Round_NNP ganja_NN is_VBZ unknown_JJ here_RB ;_: only_RB flat_JJ ganja_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN and_CC sold_VBN ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) Bhang_NNP ,_, subji_NN ,_, and_CC maya_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) charas_NN ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) ganja_NN ;_: (_( 4_CD )_) garda_NN or_CC broken_JJ ganja_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP there_EX is_VBZ no_DT culti-_JJ vation_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_NN plant_NN for_IN (_( a_DT )_) ,_, (_( b_NN )_) ,_, (_( c_NN )_) ,_, or_CC (_( d_NN )_) ._.
14_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ that_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Ahmednagar_NNP ,_, Satara_NNP ,_, and_CC Nasik_NNP ,_, and_CC that_DT bhang_NN is_VBZ prepared_VBN at_IN Surat_NNP ._.
We_PRP receive_VBP supplies_NNS from_IN these_DT districts_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP ,_, charas_NN and_CC bhang_NN deteriorate_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP told_RB ,_, by_IN keeping_VBG ,_, and_CC eventually_RB lose_VB their_PRP$ narcotic_JJ properties_NNS ._.
They_PRP keep_VBP good_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD ,_, for_IN a_DT year_NN or_CC two_CD ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP the_DT deterioration_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO atmospheric_JJ moisture_NN and_CC dampness_NN ._.
The_DT drugs_NNS should_MD be_VB stored_VBN in_IN a_DT dry_JJ godown_NN ._.
A_DT godown_NN where_WRB ganja_NN is_VBZ stored_VBN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN free_JJ of_IN rats_NNS ._.
Rats_NNS like_IN hemp_NN seed_NN ,_, and_CC injure_VB the_DT ganja_NN in_IN their_PRP$ search_NN for_IN the_DT seed_NN ._.
I_PRP know_VBP of_IN one_CD instance_NN in_IN which_WDT ganja_NN was_VBD destroyed_VBN by_IN white-_JJ ants_NNS ._.
19_CD ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, ganja_NN and_CC charas_NNS are_VBP used_VBN only_RB for_IN smoking_NN ._.
Garda_NNP ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ broken_VBN ganja_NN ,_, is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN drinking_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB sometimes_RB given_VBN to_TO buffaloes_NNS and_CC cows_NNS as_IN an_DT appetizer_NN ._.
Garda_NNP is_VBZ sometimes_RB smoked_JJ mixed_JJ with_IN ganja_NN ._.
20_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ smoked_VBN principally_RB by_IN Hindu_NNP sadhus_NN and_CC labourers_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN Muhammadans_NNP of_IN the_DT working_NN classes_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN fakirs_NNS ._.
A_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT better_JJR classes_NNS of_IN both_DT communities_NNS ,_, chiefly_NN among_IN the_DT Hindus_NNP ,_, also_RB smoke_VBD ganja_NNS ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP but_CC little_JJ charas_NN is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ smoked_VBN by_IN Pathans_NNPS ,_, fakirs_NNS ,_, sadhus_NN ,_, and_CC people_NNS from_IN northern_JJ India_NNP ._.
I_PRP estimate_VBP that_IN there_EX are_VBP of_IN all_DT classes_NNS about_IN 2,000_CD to_TO 2,500_CD ganja_NN smokers_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN 100_CD to_TO 150_CD charas_NNS smokers_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
21_CD ._.

35_CD ._.

An_DT habitual_JJ consumer_NN would_MD require_VB a_DT larger_JJR quan-_JJ tity_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN to_TO completely_RB stupefy_VB him_PRP than_IN would_MD be_VB required_VBN for_IN a_DT new_JJ or_CC occasional_JJ con-_JJ sumer_NN ._.
56_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB learnt_VBN that_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP anything_NN s_NN added_VBD to_TO hemp_VB drugs_NNS to_TO modify_VB their_PRP$ intoxicat-_JJ ing_NN effects_NNS ._.
Tobacco_NN and_CC goorako_NN are_VBP smoked_VBN with_IN ganja_NN and_CC charas_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT latter_JJ smoke_NN freely_RB ._.

(_( A_DT )_) Ganja_NNP is_VBZ not_RB subjected_VBN to_TO any_DT special_JJ treatment_NN until_IN it_PRP passes_VBZ into_IN the_DT hand_NN of_IN the_DT smoker_NN ,_, who_WP breaks_VBZ the_DT top_JJ into_IN small_JJ bits_NNS ,_, removes_NNS seeds_NNS ,_, leaves_NNS and_CC foreign_JJ matter_NN if_IN there_RB be_VB any_DT ._.
He_PRP then_RB places_VBZ the_DT broken_JJ ganja_NN on_IN the_DT palm_NN of_IN his_PRP$ left_JJ hand_NN ,_, and_CC pours_NNS water_NN over_IN it_PRP three_CD or_CC four_CD times_NNS till_VBP the_DT water_NN is_VBZ clear_JJ ,_, each_DT time_NN kneading_VBG it_PRP with_IN the_DT thumb_NN of_IN his_PRP$ right_JJ hand_NN ._.
This_DT process_NN takes_VBZ about_IN 10_CD minutes_NNS if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ properly_RB done_VBN ._.

A_DT small_JJ cake_NN is_VBZ left_VBN ,_, from_IN which_WDT pieces_NNS are_VBP broken_VBN and_CC mixed_JJ with_IN an_DT equal_JJ quantity_NN of_IN tobacco_NN ,_, and_CC smoked_VBD off_RP in_IN an_DT ordinary_JJ native_JJ tobacco_NN pipe_NN ._.

(_( B_NNP )_) Sweetmeats_NNP sold_VBN under_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN yakuti_NN ,_, majum_NN ,_, shrikhand_NN ,_, and_CC gulkand_NN are_VBP made_VBN with_IN extract_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ prepared_VBN as_IN follows:110_JJ India_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, when_WRB they_PRP can_MD manage_VB it_PRP ,_, bring_VBG bhang_NN from_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ._.

Boja.111_NNP 29_CD ._.

30_CD ._.
The_DT consumption_NN of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS is_VBZ practised_VBN both_DT in_IN solidude_NN and_CC in_IN company_NN ._.

The_DT poor_JJ and_CC the_DT idle_JJ generally_RB meet_VBP at_IN a_DT temple_NN or_CC some_DT other_JJ public_JJ place_NN and_CC indulge_NN in_IN these_DT drugs_NNS ._.

''_''

This_DT was_VBD not_RB in_IN my_PRP$ time_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP think_VBP that_IN if_IN an_DT entry_NN in_IN Form_NNP C_NNP shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ drinks_NNS bhang_VBD it_PRP would_MD be_VB a_DT mistake_NN to_TO put_VB cause_VB unknown_JJ against_IN head_NN 12_CD of_IN the_DT form_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN bhang_NN may_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN the_DT only_JJ cause_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Trimbak_NNP Vinayak_NNP ,_, the_DT entry_NN against_IN head_NN 12_CD of_IN Form_NNP C_NNP is_VBZ ``_`` Ganja-smoking_JJ and_CC absti-_JJ nence_NN from_IN food_NN ,_, ''_'' and_CC in_IN the_DT register_NN the_DT cause_NN is_VBZ put_VBN down_RP as_IN ``_`` Ganja-smoking_NNP ._. ''_''
This_DT occurred_VBD before_IN my_PRP$ time_NN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP may_MD not_RB have_VB considered_VBN that_IN abstinence_NN from_IN food_NN was_VBD an_DT existing_VBG cause_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP think_VBP he_PRP was_VBD wrong_JJ in_IN mak-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT entry_NN he_PRP did_VBD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Laxman_NNP Nandram_NNP ,_, the_DT entry_NN ``_`` Ganja_NNP and_CC liquor_VB ``_`` reverses_VBZ the_DT order_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT drug_NN appears_VBZ in_IN head_NN 6_CD of_IN Form_NNP C_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ contrary_JJ to_TO head_VB 12_CD of_IN Form_NNP C_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT entry_NN is_VBZ ``_`` Unknown_JJ ._. ''_''
I_PRP ca_MD n't_RB explain_VB why_WRB this_DT was_VBD done_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Hari_NNP Trimbak_NNP ,_, the_DT entry_NN against_IN head_NN 12_CD of_IN Form_NNP C_NNP is_VBZ ``_`` Unknown_JJ beyond_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN smoking_VBG ganja_NN ,_, ''_'' and_CC in_IN the_DT register_NN ``_`` Ganja-smoking_JJ ._. ''_''

''_''
The_DT register_NN shews_VBZ ``_`` Ganja-smoking_JJ ._. ''_''
In_IN these_DT six_CD cases_NNS the_DT register_NN entry_NN does_VBZ not_RB agree_VB with_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP 's_POS certificate_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB ought_MD to_TO be_VB something_NN on_IN the_DT record_NN to_TO explain_VB the_DT differ-_JJ ence_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ from_IN this_DT register_NN that_IN the_DT annual_JJ returns_NNS are_VBP compiled_VBN which_WDT show_VBP these_DT six_CD cases_NNS as_IN the_DT only_JJ hemp_JJ drug_NN admissions_NNS of_IN 1892_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Guljar_NNP Shah_NNP there_EX is_VBZ no_DT further_JJ information_NN beyond_IN that_DT furnished_VBD in_IN the_DT papers_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP ganja_NN has_VBZ been_VBN properly_RB entered_VBN as_IN the_DT cause_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT chief_NN and_CC the_DT existing_VBG cause_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP think_VBP that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT man_NN had_VBD not_RB taken_VBN the_DT ganja_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB become_VBN insane_NN ,_, although_IN the_DT ascetic_JJ and_CC isolated_JJ habit_NN may_MD have_VB predisposed_VBN him_PRP towards_NNS insanity_NN ._.
The_DT fur-_JJ ther_NN information_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN gathered_VBN by_IN recent_JJ enquiry_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Rangnath_NNP shows_NNS that_IN the_DT bhang-drinking_NN was_VBD moderate_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN accordance_NN with_IN what_WP I_PRP had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN told_VBN ._.
But_CC my_PRP$ private_JJ opinion_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT bhang_NN drinking_NN must_MD have_VB been_VBN greater_JJR ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT insanity_NN from_IN bhang_NN drinking_VBG passes_NNS off_IN quickly_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP there_RB must_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT predisposing_NN cause_NN in_IN the_DT present_JJ case_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT man_NN had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN insane_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ present_JJ attack_NN had_VBD lasted_VBN two_CD and_CC a_DT half_JJ years_NNS ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN country_NN liquor_NN is_VBZ more_RBR likely_JJ to_TO cause_VB insanity_NN than_IN bhang_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP no_DT reason_NN to_TO doubt_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT present_JJ case_NN the_DT man_NN did_VBD take_VB liquor_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP himself_PRP said_VBD ._.
The_DT case_NN may_MD therefore_VB have_VB been_VBN due_JJ to_TO both_DT liquor_NN and_CC bhang_NN ,_, and_CC liquor_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT more_RBR important_JJ factor_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD ._.
The_DT asylum_NN records_NNS show_VBP that_IN during_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD years_NNS there_RB have_VBP been_VBN 31_CD admissions_NNS from_IN ganja_NN ,_, 1_CD from_IN bhang_NN ,_, and_CC 10_CD from_IN country_NN liquor_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP therefore_RB regard_VBP liquor_NN as_IN a_DT more_RBR prolific_JJ cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN than_IN bhang_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Trimbak_NNP Vinayak_NNP ,_, I_PRP think_VBP the_DT cause_NN is_VBZ ganja_JJ ,_, the_DT effects_NNS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD increased_VBN by_IN the_DT abstinence_NN from_IN food_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Lax-_NNP man_NN Nandram_NNP ,_, the_DT lunatic_NN was_VBD insane_VBN for_IN two_CD and_CC a_DT half_JJ years_NNS before_IN he_PRP came_VBD into_IN the_DT asylum_NN and_CC one_CD and_CC a_DT half_NN years_NNS since_IN ._.
I_PRP see_VBP no_DT reason_NN to_TO doubt_VB his_PRP$ statement_NN that_IN he_PRP only_RB smoked_VBD ganja_JJ occasionally_RB and_CC drank_VB liquor_NN frequently_RB for_IN years_NNS ._.
The_DT dose_NN of_IN ganja_NN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT recent_JJ enquiry_NN ,_, is_VBZ moderate_JJ ._.
If_IN the_DT man_NN 's_POS statement_NN regarding_VBG his_PRP$ drinking_NN is_VBZ accepted_VBN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN ,_, as_RB much_JJ as_IN ganja_NN ,_, the_DT existing_VBG cause_NN ,_, or_CC perhaps_RB the_DT more_RBR important_JJ cause_NN ._.
In_IN any_DT case_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD probably_RB some_DT predisposing_NN cause_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Parasram_NNP ,_, the_DT recent_JJ enquiry_NN has_VBZ not_RB resulted_VBN in_IN confirming_VBG the_DT alleged_VBN ganja_NN habit_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP think_VBP nevertheless_RB that_IN the_DT man_NN 's_POS in-_JJ sanity_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO ganja_VB ,_, because_IN he_PRP admits_VBZ the_DT prac-_JJ tice_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB that_IN he_PRP gave_VBD up_RP the_DT habit_NN five_CD or_CC ten_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.
He_PRP says_VBZ this_DT sometimes_RB ,_, but_CC at_IN other_JJ times_NNS he_PRP admits_VBZ the_DT habit_NN ._.
His_PRP$ appearance_NN also_RB confirms_VBZ me_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT recent_JJ enquiry_NN people_NNS who_WP knew_VBD the_DT insane_NN say_VBP that_IN they_PRP never_RB saw_VBD him_PRP indulge_VB in_IN ganja_NN makes_VBZ us_PRP regard_VB the_DT case_NN as_IN a_DT doubtful_JJ one_CD ._.
If_IN I_PRP were_VBD preparing_VBG statistics_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN showing_VBG the_DT effects_NNS of_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS ,_, I_PRP should_MD not_RB class_NN this_DT as_IN a_DT hemp_NN case_NN ._.
*_NN In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Hari_NNP Trimbak_NNP ,_, the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP evidently_RB had_VBD doubts_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB known_VBN insanity_NN to_TO arise_VB from_IN cholera_NN ,_, though_IN the_DT disease_NN might_MD predispose_VB it_PRP by_IN weakening_VBG the_DT constitution_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB at-_VB tribute_VB the_DT attack_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN this_DT case_NN to_TO the_DT cholera_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT insane_NN had_VBD not_RB resumed_VBN his_PRP$ ganja_NN habit_NN after_IN recovery_NN from_IN the_DT cholera_NN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB he_PRP would_MD have_VB become_VBN insane_NN ._.
The_DT cholera_NN weakened_VBD the_DT man_NN 's_POS constitution_NN and_CC rendered_VBD him_PRP more_RBR liable_JJ to_TO the_DT ganja_NN poison_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT six_CD hemp_NN cases_NNS admitted_VBD to_TO the_DT asylum_NN in_IN 1892_CD ,_, I_PRP would_MD only_RB exclude_VB the_DT two_CD cases_NNS of_IN Rangnath_NNP and_CC Parasram_NNP for_IN the_DT reasons_NNS given_VBN above_IN ._.
The_DT usual_JJ type_NN of_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN insanity_NN is_VBZ acute_JJ mania_NN ._.
Acute_NNP mania_NN may_MD be_VB due_JJ to_TO various_JJ causes_NNS ._.
*_JJ Extract_NNP from_IN a_DT letter_NN No_NNP ._.

*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP ``_`` None_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS who_WP knew_VBD anything_NN of_IN Parasram_NNP says_VBZ that_IN he_PRP was_VBD ever_RB addicted_VBN to_TO smoking_VBG ganja_NN or_CC taking_VBG any_DT other_JJ narcotic_JJ or_CC alcohol_NN in_IN any_DT form_NN whatsoever_NN ._.

here_RB )_) sent_VBD you_PRP that_IN he_PRP ever_RB smoked_VBD ganja_NNS at_IN all_DT ._. ''_''
*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_VBD 144_CD There_EX are_VBP no_DT typical_JJ symptoms_NNS that_IN I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ of_IN to_TO enable_VB you_PRP to_TO diagnose_VB hemp_JJ drug_NN insanity_NN ._.
Ganja_NNP cases_NNS generally_RB recover_VBP rapidly_RB ._.
Cases_NNS arising_VBG from_IN mental_JJ shock_NN are_VBP of_IN longer_JJR duration_NN ._.
To_TO diagnose_VB by_IN this_DT symptom_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT patient_NN must_MD be_VB under_IN continuous_JJ observation_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ nevertheless_RB the_DT practice_NN to_TO enter_VB the_DT cause_NN im-_JJ mediately_RB on_IN the_DT admission_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP bas_NN had_VBD the_DT man_NN under_IN observation_NN for_IN a_DT week_NN or_CC ten_JJ days_NNS more_RBR or_CC less_JJR ,_, and_CC has_VBZ diagnosed_VBN the_DT cause_NN ._.
Insanes_NNS are_VBP rarely_RB cured_VBN by_IN the_DT time_NN they_PRP reach_VBP the_DT asylum_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP only_RB keeps_VBZ the_DT man_NN long_RB enough_RB to_TO satisfy_VB himself_PRP that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ insane_JJ ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP 's_POS diagnosis_NN is_VBZ accepted_VBN ,_, but_CC if_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO think_VB the_DT diagnosis_NN is_VBZ wrong_JJ ,_, he_PRP ought_MD to_TO change_VB it_PRP ._.
As_IN a_DT fact_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB known_VBN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN such_JJ change_NN since_IN I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN at_IN Poona_NNP ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS are_VBP of_IN short_JJ duration_NN in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, about_IN a_DT week_NN or_CC ten_JJ dys_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT second_JJ attack_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT indulgence_NN has_VBZ gone_VBN to_TO great_JJ excess_NN ,_, the_DT insanity_NN would_MD last_JJ longer_NN ._.
I_PRP know_VBP the_DT insanity_NN of_IN the_DT kind_NN called_VBN transient_NN mania_NN ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB caused_VBN by_IN mental_JJ shock_NN or_CC nervous_JJ shock_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT debauch_JJ of_IN wine_NN ,_, bhang_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ intoxicants_NNS ,_, especially_RB by_IN a._JJ person_NN of_IN weak_JJ temperament_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP known_VBN fever_NN to_TO produce_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT latter_JJ case_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS often_RB due_JJ to_TO moral_JJ causes_NNS ,_, and_CC not_RB to_TO toxic_VB physical_JJ causes_NNS ,_, though_IN these_DT may_MD produce_VB it_PRP ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN transient_NN mania_NN caused_VBN by_IN ganja_NN would_MD be_VB difficult_JJ or_CC almost_RB impossible_JJ to_TO distinguish_VB from_IN the_DT same_JJ form_NN of_IN insanity_NN due_JJ to_TO any_DT other_JJ case_NN if_IN history_NN were_VBD wanting_VBG ._.
I_PRP think_VBP I_PRP have_VBP noticed_VBN that_IN persons_NNS insane_VBP from_IN bhang_NN have_VBP red_VBN and_CC watery_JJ eyes_NNS ._.
This_DT symptom_NN may_MD be_VB produced_VBN by_IN fever_NN ,_, but_CC is_VBZ generally_RB present_JJ in_IN bhang_NN cases_NNS ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO produce_VB contraction_NN of_IN the_DT pupil_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN great_JJ excess_NN to_TO the_DT point_NN of_IN intoxication_NN or_CC insensibility_NN it_PRP might_MD cause_VB dilatation_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB short_JJ duration_NN ,_, redness_NN of_IN eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC dilated_VBD pupils_NNS would_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO diagnose_VB a_DT case_NN upon_NN ._.
These_DT symptoms_NNS would_MD point_VB to_TO hemp_VB insanity_NN rather_RB than_IN any_DT other_JJ cause_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP are_VBP recognised_VBN as_IN symptoms_NNS of_IN transient_NN mania_NN due_JJ to_TO other_JJ causes_NNS than_IN hemp_JJ drugs_NNS ._.
But_CC I_PRP think_VBP redness_NN of_IN eyes_NNS is_VBZ more_JJR marked_JJ in_IN hemp_NN insanity_NN than_IN in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP an_DT accurate_JJ history_NN is_VBZ essential_JJ to_TO diagnose_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN ._.
Hemp_NNP drugs_NNS may_MD predispose_VB ,_, but_CC I_PRP should_MD rather_RB regard_VB them_PRP as_IN exciting_VBG cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS have_VBP slightly_RB cumulative_JJ effects_NNS ,_, but_CC not_RB more_RBR so_RB than_IN alcohol_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP not_RB to_TO be_VB classed_VBN with_IN digitalis_NN or_CC arsenic_NN in_IN this_DT respect_NN ._.
For_IN diagnosis_NN ,_, duration_NN of_IN the_DT habit_NN ,_, the_DT amount_NN of_IN drug_NN used_VBN ,_, and_CC hereditary_JJ history_NN are_VBP necessary_JJ ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN if_IN the_DT information_NN regarding_VBG a_DT man_NN suffering_VBG from_IN acute_JJ mania_NN were_VBD nothing_NN more_JJR than_IN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD ganja_JJ smoker_NN ,_, the_DT ganja_NN should_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT existing_VBG cause_NN in_IN eighteen_JJ cases_NNS out_IN of_IN twenty_NN ._.
The_DT mere_JJ statement_NN of_IN the_DT ganja_NN habit_NN would_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ if_IN there_EX were_VBD no_DT reason_NN to_TO disbelieve_VB it_PRP ._.
The_DT man_NN whose_WP$ case_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN by_IN Mr._NNP Fox_NNP was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO me_PRP occasionally_RB as_IN an_DT out-door_JJ patient_NN a_DT year_NN ago_RB ._.
I_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO get_VB further_JJ information_NN about_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC Mr._NNP Fox_NNP is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP has_VBZ not_RB mentioned_VBN the_DT man_NN 's_POS name_NN ._.
My_PRP$ recollection_NN is_VBZ that_IN I_PRP was_VBD informed_VBN that_IN his_PRP$ attack_NN was_VBD due_JJ in_IN great_JJ measure_NN to_TO the_DT persecution_NN he_PRP had_VBD suffered_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ conversion_NN to_TO Christianity_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN to_TO smoking_VBG ganja_NN in_IN consequence_NN ._.
I_PRP only_RB saw_VBD the_DT man_NN two_CD or_CC three_CD times_NNS as_IN an_DT out-_JJ patient_NN ,_, and_CC am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO exclude_VB other_JJ possible_JJ causes_NNS to_TO account_VB for_IN his_PRP$ mental_JJ condition_NN ._.
I_PRP remember_VBP telling_VBG Mr._NNP Fox_NNP that_IN if_IN he_PRP allowed_VBD the_DT man_NN to_TO go_VB on_IN smoking_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD certainly_RB get_VB an_DT attack_NN of_IN acute_NN mania_NN ._.
I_PRP formed_VBD this_DT impression_NN from_IN the_DT man_NN 's_POS looks_NNS ,_, which_WDT appeared_VBD to_TO me_PRP to_TO show_VB that_IN he_PRP was_VBD verging_VBG on_IN insanity_NN ._.
The_DT information_NN about_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN 's_POS distress_NN came_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, who_WP either_DT told_VBD me_PRP or_CC the_DT house_NN surgeon_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN observing_VBG eases_NNS of_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN insanity_NN for_IN seven_CD or_CC eight_CD years_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB observed_VBN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT hemp_NN drugs_NNS apart_RB from_IN insanity_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP spoken_VBN to_TO many_JJ people_NNS who_WP have_VBP told_VBN me_PRP they_PRP were_VBD moderate_JJ smokers_NNS ,_, but_CC seen_VBN no_DT effects_NNS among_IN such_JJ persons_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB any_DT excessive_JJ consumer_NN ,_, nor_CC have_VBP I_PRP had_VBD to_TO do_VB with_IN any_DT such_JJ persons_NNS ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN treatment_NN for_IN mental_JJ disease_NN ._.
My_PRP$ impression_NN of_IN the_DT connection_NN between_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS and_CC insanity_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB not_RB based_VBN on_IN any_DT knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ consumption_NN and_CC effects_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN among_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
70_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN SURGEON-MAJOR_NNP H._NNP McCALMAN_NNP ,_, Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC Superintendent_NNP ,_, Dharwar_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
Question_NN 1.145_CD transfer_NN it_PRP to_TO the_DT asylum_NN register_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD be_VB entered_VBN in_IN the_DT register_NN within_IN a_DT day_NN or_CC two_CD of_IN the_DT admission_NN of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ ._.
I_PRP would_MD accept_VB it_PRP ,_, because_IN I_PRP think_VBP the_DT Magistrate_NNP has_VBZ greater_JJR facilities_NNS than_IN I_PRP have_VBP to_TO conduct_VB an_DT enquiry_NN into_IN the_DT previous_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN ,_, and_CC because_IN the_DT diagnosis_NN of_IN cause_NN depends_VBZ practically_RB exclusively_RB on_IN his-_JJ tory_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB know_VB through_IN what_WP officer_NN the_DT Magis-_NNP trate_NN conducts_VBZ his_PRP$ enquiry_NN ._.
I_PRP should_MD hesitate_VB to_TO accept_VB the_DT results_NNS of_IN an_DT enquiry_NN conducted_VBN by_IN a_DT Head_NNP Constable_NNP unless_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN verified_VBN by_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB aware_JJ of_IN the_DT procedure_NN ,_, and_CC can_MD not_RB say_VB if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ usual_JJ for_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP to_TO verify_VB the_DT enquiry_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Dariappa_NNP ,_, admitted_VBD to_TO the_DT asylum_NN in_IN 1892_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP read_VBN the_DT remarks_NNS in_IN column_NN 5_CD ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO think_VB that_IN though_IN insanity_NN may_MD have_VB arisen_VBN from_IN both_DT liquor_NN and_CC ganja_NN ,_, the_DT latter_NN should_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT predisposing_NN cause_NN ._.
I_PRP should_MD hardly_RB say_VB that_IN there_EX were_VBD any_DT typical_JJ symptoms_NNS in_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN insanity_NN ._.
The_DT symptoms_NNS present_NN are_VBP generally_RB those_DT of_IN acute_JJ mania_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB incorrect_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN all_PDT the_DT symptoms_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP observed_VBN in_IN hemp_NN drugs_NNS insanity_NN are_VBP to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN acute_NN mania_NN ,_, due_JJ to_TO other_JJ causes_NNS ._.
The_DT shortness_NN of_IN duration_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, suggestive_NN of_IN the_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN cause_NN ._.
To_TO discover_VB this_DT sign_NN the_DT patient_NN must_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN ._.
The_DT cause_NN is_VBZ entered_VBN in_IN the_DT register_NN directly_RB the_DT patient_NN arrives_VBZ ._.

This_DT resinous_JJ exudation_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN in_IN hemp_JJ seedlings_NNS even_RB when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP too_RB young_JJ to_TO flower_VB ._.

This_DT is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN the_DT usual_JJ practice_NN for_IN securing_VBG good_JJ compact_JJ leafy_JJ heads_NNS of_IN flower-_JJ ing_NN tops_NNS and_CC for_IN preventing_VBG the_DT formation_NN of_IN seeds_NNS ._.

29_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ seldom_RB ,_, if_IN ever_RB ,_, smoked_VBN by_IN itself_PRP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ finely_RB rubbed_VBN on_IN a_DT curry_NN stone_NN ,_, and_CC strained_VBD through_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN fine_JJ muslin_NN ._.
Persons_NNS who_WP drink_VBP bhang_NN for_IN mere_JJ pleasure_NN always_RB add_VB ,_, besides_IN black_JJ pepper_NN ,_, the_DT following_JJ ingredients_NNS for_IN flavouring_VBG the_DT potion_NN :_: 148_CD circle_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ homes_NNS ,_, men_NNS who_WP have_VBP to_TO work_VB for_IN their_PRP$ living_NN and_CC minister_NN to_TO the_DT daily_JJ wants_VBZ of_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS and_CC children_NNS ,_, to_TO develop_VB into_IN the_DT exces-_JJ sive_JJ ganja_NN smoker_NN or_CC bhang_NN drinker_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT men_NNS who_WP have_VBP nothing_NN to_TO do_VB in_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT world149_NN It_PRP does_VBZ intoxicate_VB men_NNS not_RB accustomed_VBN to_TO it_PRP ._.
It_PRP staves_VBZ off_IN hunger_NN ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ tran-_JJ sient_NN ._.

Want_NNP of_IN a_DT ganja_JJ smoke_NN to_TO a_DT habitual_JJ but_CC moderate_JJ smoker_NN produces_VBZ uneasiness_JJ ._.
The_DT man_NN misses_VBZ his_PRP$ little_JJ excitement_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ always_RB a_DT longing_NN for_IN it_PRP among_IN confirmed_JJ smokers_NNS ._.
The_DT same_JJ is_VBZ the_DT case_NN with_IN habitual_JJ moderate_JJ bhang_NN drinkers_NNS ._.
Bhang_NNP drinking_NN is_VBZ decidedly_RB cooling_VBG at_IN first_JJ ;_: by-_JJ and-bye_JJ the_DT drinker_NN feels_NNS exhilarated_VBN ;_: within_IN half_PDT an_DT hour_NN he_PRP becomes_VBZ talkative_JJ ,_, after_IN which_WDT he_PRP feels_VBZ sleepy_NN ,_, especially_RB if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT novice_NN ._.
The_DT sleep_NN is_VBZ full_JJ of_IN dreams_NNS ._.

The_DT desire_NN for_IN food_NN is_VBZ in_IN some_DT instances_NNS immediate_VBP ;_: and_CC a_DT man_NN may_MD eat_VB voraciously_RB under_IN its_PRP$ influence_NN ._.
Some_DT prefer_VBP taking_VBG bhang_NN on_IN an_DT empty_JJ stomach_NN ;_: others_NNS take_VBP it_PRP a_DT couple_NN of_IN hours_NNS after_IN food_NN ._.

the_DT head_NN and_CC still_RB continues_VBZ to_TO be_VB talkative_JJ ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, not_RB considered_VBN wrong_JJ by_IN the_DT devotees_NNS of_IN Shiva_NNP to_TO indulge_VB in_IN ganja_NN or_CC bhang_NN on_IN days_NNS held_VBN sacred_VBD to_TO that_DT divinity_NN ._.
45_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP two_CD classes_NNS of_IN moderate_JJ habitual_JJ smokers_NNS of_IN ganja_NN and_CC drinkers_NNS of_IN bhang_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP some_DT ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, who_WP have_VBP a_DT perfectly_RB good_JJ physique_NN and_CC a_DT healthy_JJ body_NN whose_WP$ mind_NN is_VBZ perfectly_RB clear_JJ and_CC active_JJ ,_, and_CC who_WP lead_VBP a_DT moral_JJ life_NN ,_, and_CC indulge_NN in_IN their_PRP$ respect-_JJ ive_JJ practices_NNS before_IN their_PRP$ day_NN 's_POS work_NN is_VBZ begun_VBN or_CC after_IN they_PRP have_VBP finished_VBN it_PRP ._.
There_EX are_VBP others_NNS again_RB who_WP even_RB after_IN moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN bhang_NN or_CC ganja_NN live_VBP a_DT life_NN of_IN idleness_NN and_CC are_VBP unfit_JJ for_IN any_DT kind_NN of_IN work_NN requiring_VBG mental_JJ or_CC physical_JJ exertion_NN ._.
They_PRP may_MD be_VB otherwise_RB healthy_JJ and_CC perhaps_RB mentally_RB happy_JJ ;_: they_PRP may_MD also_RB be_VB moral_JJ ;_: but_CC they_PRP are_VBP persons_NNS who_WP show_VBP that_IN they_PRP are_VBP indulging_VBG in_IN a_DT practice_NN which_WDT is_VBZ doing_VBG them_PRP no_DT good_JJ ._.
These_DT drugs_NNS lead_VBP to_TO a_DT little_JJ emaciation_NN ,_, es-_JJ pecially_RB smoking_VBG ,_, or_CC when_WRB after_IN bhang_IN the_DT required_JJ supply_NN of_IN food_NN is_VBZ not_RB available_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ noted_VBN by_IN ancient_JJ Hindu_NNP writers_NNS as_IN a_DT reducer_NN of_IN fat_NN ._.

As_IN noted_VBN above_IN ,_, ganja-smoking_JJ impairs_VBZ the_DT power_NN of_IN digestion_NN ,_, and_CC though_IN it_PRP may_MD actually_RB cause_VB loss_NN of_IN appetite_NN ,_, it_PRP staves_VBZ off_IN hunger_NN ._.
Hence_NN it_PRP is_VBZ that_IN the_DT bairagis_NN and_CC gosains_NNS look_VBP upon_IN it_PRP as_IN a_DT stand-by_NN when_WRB the_DT collected_JJ alms_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN do_VB not_RB give_VB them_PRP their_PRP$ full_JJ meal_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB seen_VBN ,_, nor_CC have_VBP I_PRP heard_VBP from_IN any_DT re-_JJ liable_JJ source_NN of_IN dysentery_NN ,_, asthma_NN ,_, or_CC bronchitis_NN being_VBG traced_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN hemp_NN in_IN moderation_NN ._.

But_CC as_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN with_IN habituals_NNS ,_, bhang_NN sharpens_VBZ the_DT intellect_NN ,_, so_RB does_VBZ ganja_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP am_VBP inclined_JJ to_TO believe_VB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no-_JJ thing_NN in_IN bhang_NN or_CC ganja_NN to_TO lead_VB to_TO habits_NNS of_IN im-_JJ morality_NN or_CC debauchery_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB satisfied_VBN that_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS acts_NNS as_IN a_DT direct_JJ aphrodisiac_NN ._.

100_CD ._.

44_CD ._.
The_DT immediate_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT three_CD drugs_NNS on_IN the_DT habitual_JJ consumer_NN is_VBZ indeed_RB refreshing_VBG ._.
Being_VBG habitual_JJ ,_, it_PRP doss_VBZ not_RB produce_VB intoxication_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP infuses_VBZ vigour_NN and_CC strength_NN in_IN the_DT system_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD never_RB allay_VB hunger_NN ,_, but_CC would_MD whet_VB appetite_NN and_CC help_VB diges-_JJ tion_NN Comparatively_RB the_DT effect_NN of_IN bhang_NN lasts_NNS for_IN a_DT longer_JJR time_NN than_IN that_DT of_IN ganja_NN ._.

(_( a_DT )_) The_DT prohibition_NN of_IN bhang_NN and_CC ganja_NN would_MD be_VB followed_VBN by_IN recourse_NN to_TO alcoholic_JJ stimulants_NNS amongst_JJ people_NNS who_WP have_VBP no_DT religious_JJ prejudices_NNS against_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN alcohol_NN ,_, provided_VBD that_IN they_PRP could_MD incur_VB increased_JJ expenditure_NN ;_: but_CC non-drink-_JJ ing_NN Hindus_NNP and_CC Muhammadans_NNPS would_MD not_RB take_VB to_TO alcoholic_JJ stimulants_NNS owing_VBG to_TO the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN bhang_NN and_CC ganja_NN under_IN any_DT circumstances_NNS ._.

15_CD ._.
The_DT wild_JJ plant_NN is_VBZ nowhere_RB grown_VBN in_IN our_PRP$ province_NN ,_, therefore_RB no_DT description_NN of_IN the_DT products_NNS therefrom_NN can_MD be_VB given_VBN ._.
I_PRP describe_VBP the_DT methods_NNS of_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT three_CD products_NNS of_IN the_DT cultivated_JJ hemp_NN plant_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT plants_NNS are_VBP full-grown_JJ and_CC wide-spread_JJ ,_, the_DT tassels_NNS shoot_VBP out_RP at_IN the_DT top_NN ;_: resinous_JJ or_CC sticky_JJ substance_NN is_VBZ found_VBN over_IN the_DT stems_NNS and_CC the_DT tassels_NNS when_WRB the_DT ganja_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN ripe_JJ and_CC the_DT harvesting_NN season_NN approached_VBD ._.

Pieces_NNS of_IN ganja_NN tassels_NNS or_CC powder_NN found_VBD lying_VBG underneath_IN the_DT tassels_NNS trodden_VBN under_IN foot_NN and_CC also_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN packing_VBG up_RP are_VBP called_VBN bhang_NN ._.
In_IN North_NNP Hindustan_NNP ,_, towards_NNS Benares_NNP ,_, the_DT bhang-producing_JJ plants_NNS are_VBP said_VBD to_TO be_VB of_IN quite_RB a_DT different_JJ kind_NN from_IN the_DT hemp_NN plants_NNS known_VBN here_RB ._.
The_DT pieces_NNS or_CC powder_NN of_IN the_DT leaves_NNS of_IN the_DT plants_NNS are_VBP used_VBN in_IN smoking_NN ,_, eating_NN ,_, and_CC drinking_NN ._.

16_CD ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ not_RB prepared_VBN generally_RB by_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ._.

18_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP ,_, charas_NN and_CC bhang_NN deteriorate_NN by_IN keeping_VBG ._.
They_PRP quite_RB lose_VBP their_PRP$ effect_NN in_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN ._.

After_IN two_CD years_NNS they_PRP quite_RB lose_VBP their_PRP$ qualities_NNS ._.
By_IN exposure_NN to_TO wind_VB and_CC sun_VB the_DT drugs_NNS are_VBP spoiled_VBN ,_, and_CC by_IN moisture_NN and_CC dampness_NN they_PRP give_VBP out_RP a_DT bad_JJ smell_NN ._.
To_TO prevent_VB deterioration_NN the_DT drugs_NNS must_MD be_VB kept_VBN in_IN a_DT warm_JJ and_CC unwindy_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC should_MD not_RB be_VB exposed_VBN to_TO open_VB air_NN ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT deteriorated_JJ ganja_NN is_VBZ said_VBD by_IN its_PRP$ consumers_NNS to_TO be_VB burning_VBG in_IN the_DT stomach_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN smoking_NN ,_, eating_NN and_CC drinking_NN ,_, while_IN charas_NNS is_VBZ used_VBN exclusively_RB for_IN smoking_NN ._.

20_CD ._.
Ganja_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN smoking_NN by_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN people_NNS ,_, except_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC Parsis_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT pro-_JJ portion_NN of_IN about_RB 1_CD to_TO 400_CD Lengayet_NNP and_CC Brahmins_NNP ,_, 1_CD to_TO 100_CD other_JJ Hindus_NNP and_CC Musalmans_NNPS ._.

44_CD ._.
The_DT immediate_JJ effect_NN of_IN the_DT moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN smoking_VBG on_IN the_DT habitual_JJ consumers_NNS is_VBZ satisfac-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP intoxicated_VBN for_IN about_IN an_DT hour_NN and_CC free_JJ from_IN all_DT cares_NNS ._.
By_IN eating_VBG and_CC drinking_VBG the_DT effect_NN of_IN intoxication_NN remains_VBZ for_IN about_IN six_CD hours_NNS ._.
This_DT intoxication_NN is_VBZ looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN a_DT relief_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ refreshing_VBG ._.
It_PRP produces_VBZ intoxication_NN ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB allay_VB hunger_NN ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB create_VB appetite_NN ._.

The_DT want_NN of_IN subsequent_JJ gratifica-_JJ tion_NN produces_VBZ uneasiness_JJ ._.
45_CD ._.
The_DT habitual_JJ moderate_JJ use_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN these_DT drugs_NNS produces_VBZ noxious_JJ effects_NNS on_IN body_NN and_CC mind_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB on_IN morality_NN ._.
It_PRP burns_VBZ the_DT blood_NN and_CC im-_JJ pairs_NNS constitution_NN ._.
It_PRP injures_VBZ the_DT digestion_NN and_CC causes_VBZ loss_NN of_IN appetite_NN ._.
It_PRP causes_VBZ dysentery_NN ,_, bron-_JJ chitis_NN ,_, or_CC asthma_NN ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB impair_VB the_DT moral_JJ sense_NN ._.
It_PRP induces_VBZ laziness_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB habits_NNS of_IN im-_JJ morality_NN or_CC debauchery_NN ._.

4_CD ._.

This_DT is_VBZ taken_VBN as_IN a_DT cooling_NN drink_NN ,_, and_CC persons_NNS subject_VBP to_TO piles_NNS take_VB it_PRP either_RB with_IN or_CC without_IN some_DT other_JJ medicine_NN ._.
Bhang_NNP is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB soothing_NN and_CC digestive_JJ properties_NNS ._.

This_DT is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ explanation_NN I_PRP can_MD give_VB of_IN the_DT great_JJ drop_NN in_IN 1889-90_JJ and_CC the_DT increase_NN in_IN 1893_CD ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB recall_VB any_DT other_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, except_IN some_DT information_NN some_DT of_IN our_PRP$ officers_NNS got_VBD which_WDT enabled_VBD us_PRP to_TO make_VB important_JJ seizures_NNS ._.
The_DT last_JJ two_CD or_CC three_CD months_NNS show_VBP seizures_VBZ slack_RB again_RB ._.
Magistrates_NNS give_VBP rewards_NNS ._.
Sometimes_RB half_PDT the_DT fine_JJ ,_, sometimes_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT Customs_NNS officers_NNS who_WP seize_VBP the_DT stuff_NN ._.
They_PRP pay_VBP the_DT informer_NN by_IN private_JJ arrangement_NN ._.
It_PRP depends_VBZ on_IN the_DT generosity_NN of_IN the_DT officer_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN com-_JJ plaints_NNS made_VBN by_IN informers_NNS and_CC have_VBP used_VBN my_PRP$ in-_JJ fluence_NN to_TO get_VB the_DT informers_NNS due_JJ amount_NN ;_: for_IN we_PRP can_MD not_RB work_VB successfully_RB without_IN them_PRP ._.
All_PDT the_DT seizures_NNS mentioned_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ memorandum_NN are_VBP quite_RB apart_RB from_IN the_DT police_NN ._.
Officers_NNS making_VBG large_JJ seizures_NNS have_VBP sometimes_RB complained_VBN to_TO me_PRP of_IN cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT smugglers_NNS were_VBD heavily_RB fined_VBN and_CC went_VBD to_TO jail_VB without_IN paying_VBG ._.
In_IN these_DT cases_NNS no_DT fine_NN is_VBZ realised_VBN and_CC no_DT reward_NN given_VBN ._.

I_PRP think_VBP some_DT measures_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO avoid_VB this_DT ._.
Again_RB ,_, if_IN a_DT conviction_NN is_VBZ not_RB obtained_VBN ,_, no_DT special_JJ rewards_NNS are_VBP given_VBN to_TO us_PRP ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB say_VB whether_IN every_DT one_CD who_WP wants_VBZ ganja_NN can_MD get_VB it_PRP in_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.

Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP E._NNP LEWIS_NNP ,_, Excise_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Rangoon_NNP ._.

I_PRP am_VBP senior_JJ Excise_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Ran-_NNP goon_NN and_CC the_DT district_NN of_IN Hanthawaddy_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN thirty-two_JJ years_NNS in_IN Burma_NNP and_CC ._.
for_IN eighteen_JJ years_NNS in_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.

I_PRP remember_VBP the_DT issue_NN of_IN the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
The_DT drug_NN was_VBD largely_RB used_VBN by_IN natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP in_IN Thayetmyo_NNP ,_, by_IN men_NNS employed_VBN in_IN the_DT Commissariat_NNP ,_, etc_NN ._.
