The_DT source_NN of_IN supply_NN was_VBD Upper_NNP Burma_NNP ._.
After_IN the_DT prohibition_NN I_PRP made_VBD extensive_JJ seizures_NNS from_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP in_IN my_PRP$ police_NN capacity_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT other_JJ source_NN of_IN supply_NN then_RB ,_, for_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT railway_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT journey_NN was_VBD fifteen_JJ or_CC twenty_JJ days_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD much_JJ ganja_NN over_IN the_DT border_NN ._.
I_PRP was_VBD stationed_VBN in_IN Alimyo_NNP ,_, near_IN Minla_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD easily_RB obtainable_JJ ._.
The_DT con-_JJ sumers_NNS prefer_VBP Madras_NNP ganja_NN to_TO local_JJ ganja_NN ,_, and_CC elephant-drivers_NNS may_MD have_VB brought_VBN some_DT up_RP with_IN them_PRP when_WRB they_PRP came_VBD up-country_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN it_PRP within_IN ten_JJ miles_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ old_JJ border_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN small_JJ plots_NNS of_IN cultivation392_NN few_JJ ._.
Burmans_NNS use_VBP ganja_NN for_IN their_PRP$ cattle_NNS ,_, not_RB for_IN themselves_PRP ._.

20_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MAJOR_NNP PEILE_NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP Inspector-General_JJ of_IN Police_NNP in_IN Burma_NNP ._.
The_DT military_JJ police_NN are_VBP mainly_RB Northern_NNP Indians_NNP and_CC Gurkhas_NNP and_CC also_RB a_DT few_JJ Karens_NNP ._.
The_DT civil_JJ police_NN are_VBP almost_RB entirely_RB Burmans_NNPS ,_, excluding_VBG the_DT European_JJ officers_NNS ._.
In_IN municipal_JJ towns_NNS we_PRP have_VBP a_DT few_JJ Indians_NNP also_RB ._.

Before_IN that_DT I_PRP had_VBD been_VBN in_IN service_NN in_IN the_DT army_NN ._.
For_IN about_IN a_DT year_NN I_PRP was_VBD Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Military_NNP Police_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN three_CD years_NNS I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN Inspector-_NNP General_NNP of_IN the_DT whole_JJ force_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP there_EX are_VBP about_IN 16,500_CD military_JJ police_NN and_CC about_IN 13,000_CD civil_JJ ._.
The_DT military_JJ police_NNS have_VBP been_VBN employed_VBN in_IN Lower_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP for_IN about_RB four_CD years_NNS ._.
They_PRP work_VBP over_IN the_DT same_JJ area_NN as_IN the_DT civil_JJ ;_: but_CC in_IN Lower_NNP Burma_NNP and_CC the_DT lower_JJR parts_NNS of_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP they_PRP are_VBP used_VBN for_IN treasury_NN and_CC other_JJ guards_NNS and_CC escorts_NNS ._.
In_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP ,_, as_IN they_PRP are_VBP required_VBN for_IN sending_VBG out_RP columns_NNS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN in_IN Lower_NNP Burma_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB much_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN by_IN men_NNS in_IN the_DT force_NN ._.
I_PRP had_VBD a_DT case_NN about_IN two_CD years_NNS ago_RB of_IN a_DT Gurkha_NNP who_WP was_VBD reprimanded_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ officer_NN for_IN quarrelling_VBG in_IN the_DT lines_NNS and_CC tried_VBN to_TO shoot_VB his_PRP$ officer_NN ._.

I_PRP think_VBP the_DT natives_NNS would_MD more_RBR readily_RB attribute_VB such_JJ an_DT act_NN to_TO ganja_VB than_IN to_TO drink_VB ._.
They_PRP distrust_VBP a_DT ganja_NN smoker_NN ._.

So_RB far_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, as_IN I_PRP know_VBP ,_, the_DT discipline_NN of_IN the_DT force_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN affected_VBN by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.

I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN smuggling_VBG of_IN ganja_NN by_IN the_DT military_JJ police_NN is_VBZ common_JJ ;_: and_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN is_VBZ very_RB common_JJ in_IN the_DT force_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB people_NNS not_RB using_VBG the_DT drug_NN in_IN India_NNP would_MD use_VB it_PRP here_RB ._.
Burma_NNP has_VBZ not_RB proved_VBN unhealthy_JJ to_TO them_PRP ._.

On_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, men_NNS using_VBG it_PRP in_IN India_NNP might_MD give_VB it_PRP up_RP here_RB owing_VBG to_TO the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN getting_VBG it_PRP ._.
We_PRP recruit_VBP throughout_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC get_VB ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, the_DT same_JJ kind_NN of_IN men_NNS as_IN join_NN regiments_NNS ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ smuggling_NN of_IN ganja_NN into_IN Burma_NNP ._.
We_PRP catch_VBP cases_NNS sometimes_RB ._.
But_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB give_VB figures_NNS ._.
I_PRP should_MD have_VB nothing_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN Customs_NNP seizures_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT police_NN sometimes_RB search_VB on_IN information_NN received_VBN ._.
From_IN what_WP I_PRP hear_VBP I_PRP understand_VBP that_IN smuggling_NN is_VBZ constantly_RB going_VBG on_IN at_IN the_DT ports_NNS and_CC also_RB a_DT little_JJ up-country_JJ across_IN the_DT border_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB so_RB much_JJ of_IN ganja_NN there_RB as_IN of_IN opium_NN ._.
Last_JJ year_NN we_PRP had_VBD orders_NNS to_TO go_VB and_CC establish_VB a_DT post_NN at_IN Sima_NNP ,_, north-east_NN of_IN Bhamo_NNP ._.
We_PRP left_VBD a_DT garrison_NN of_IN three_CD hundred_VBN men_NNS there_RB ._.
I_PRP heard_VBP that_IN they_PRP were_VBD getting_VBG some_DT kind_NN of_IN ganja_NN and_CC making_VBG it_PRP into_IN a_DT drink_NN and_CC using_VBG it_PRP ._.
The_DT Kachins_NNP found_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT jungles_NNS and_CC sold_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT men_NNS ._.
We_PRP took_VBD measures_NNS to_TO stop_VB it_PRP ._.

That_DT was_VBD my_PRP$ impression_NN ._.
We_PRP could_MD ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, easily_RB obtain_VB a_DT specimen_NNS of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.

This_DT is_VBZ not_RB the_DT only_JJ case_NN I_PRP know_VBP of_IN the_DT cultivation_NN or_CC growth_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN ._.

22_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MR._NNP R._NNP W._NNP MARTIN_NNP ,_, District_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, Rangoon_NNP ._.
51_CD ._.
A_DT small_JJ proportion_NN of_IN bad_JJ characters_NNS con-_JJ sume_JJ ganja_NN ._.
Many_JJ respectable_JJ natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP partake_NN of_IN bhang_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN cooling_VBG drinks_NNS ,_, others_NNS smoke_VBD ganja_JJ mixed_JJ with_IN tobacco_NN ,_, others_NNS partake_VBP of_IN it_PRP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN sweet_JJ halwa_NN called_VBN ma-_JJ jum_NN ._.
Fakirs_NNS take_VBP it_PRP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN pills_NNS ;_: they_PRP mix_VBP the_DT ganja_NN with_IN pepper_NN and_CC ginger_NN ._.
Ganja_NNP leaves_NNS are_VBP also_RB cooked_VBN in_IN curries_NNS ._.
The_DT drug_NN is_VBZ smuggled_VBN into_IN Burma_NNP from_IN India_NNP through_IN the_DT Postal_NNP Department_NNP and_CC by_IN steamers_NNS ._.
In_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ often_RB seen_VBN grow-_JJ ing_NN near_IN villages_NNS and_CC is_VBZ used_VBN medicinally_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT connection_NN between_IN hemp_JJ drug_NN and_CC crime_NN ._.
52_CD ._.
The_DT excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB dele-_JJ terious_JJ ,_, persons_NNS indulging_VBG in_IN its_PRP$ use_NN and_CC while_IN under_IN its_PRP$ influence_NN have_VBP no_DT inclination_NN to_TO commit_VB crime_NN ;_: on_IN the_DT contrary_JJ ,_, the_DT feeling_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN drowsiness_NN with_IN an_DT inclination_NN to_TO remain_VB indoor_JJ ._.
53_CD ._.
Excessive_JJ indulgence_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN does_VBZ not_RB incite_VB unpremeditated_JJ crime_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP be-_VBP lieve_JJ it_PRP has_VBZ its_PRP$ bad_JJ results_NNS on_IN the_DT constitution_NN and_CC the_DT consumer_NN grows_VBZ cowardly_RB ._.
54_CD ._.
The_DT consumer_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, when_WRB under_IN its_PRP$ influence_NN ,_, grows_VBZ lazy_NN and_CC drowsy_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB does_VBZ not_RB go_VB in_IN for_IN committing_VBG crime_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP believe_VBP criminals_NNS when_WRB in_IN want_NN of_IN funds_NNS commit_VBP crime_NN to_TO enable_VB them_PRP to_TO procure_VB the_DT drug_NN ._.
55_CD ._.

23_CD ._.

Charas_NNP is_VBZ put_VBN into_IN a_DT capsule_NN of_IN prepared_JJ tobacco_NN (_( used_VBN in_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN smoking_VBG )_) ,_, and_CC then_RB put_VB on_IN fire_NN ,_, which_WDT melts_VBZ the_DT charas_NNS and_CC thereby_RB gets_VBZ it_PRP mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT tobacco_NN ._.

Bhang_NNP is_VBZ used_VBN with_IN black_JJ pepper_NN ,_, aniseed_NN ,_, rose_VBD petals_NNS ,_, cucumber_NN seeds_NNS ,_, milk_NN and_CC sugar_NN ._.

About_IN live_CD years_NNS ago_RB a_DT police_NN constable_NN ,_, a_DT native_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, was_VBD under_IN my_PRP$ treat-_JJ ment_NN suffering_VBG from_IN mania_NN said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN caused_VBN by_IN excessive_JJ use_NN of_IN ganja_NN smoking_NN and_CC bhang_NN drinking_NN ._.

406_CD 49.Evidence_CD of_IN the_DT RIGHT_NNP REV_NNP ._.

Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP for_IN twenty-two_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC over_IN eleven_JJ years_NNS in_IN Burma_NNP ._.

drugs_NNS ._.
In_IN those_DT cases_NNS I_PRP found_VBD no_DT history_NN of_IN liquor_NN ._.

In_IN Burma_NNP the_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN has_VBZ never_RB come_VBN into_IN my_PRP$ experience_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ attracted_VBN my_PRP$ attention_NN only_RB from_IN the_DT reports_NNS I_PRP have_VBP read_VBN in_IN regard_NN to_TO smuggling_NN of_IN ganja_NN ._.
I_PRP received_VBD copies_NNS of_IN the_DT questions_NNS of_IN the_DT Commission_NNP to_TO distribute_VB ._.
I_PRP distributed_VBD ten_JJ copies_NNS ,_, but_CC only_RB received_VBD one_CD answer_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP since_IN enquired_VBN ,_, and_CC am_VBP told_VBN that_IN Burmans_NNPS never_RB use_VBP the_DT drug_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB my-_VBN self_NN met_VBD a_DT Burman_NNP who_WP did_VBD ._.
I_PRP should_MD say_VB from_IN what_WP I_PRP hear_VBP that_IN there_EX must_MD be_VB difficulty_NN in_IN getting_VBG the_DT drug_NN by_IN natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, but_CC that_IN there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ brought_NN in_IN ._.
My_PRP$ impression_NN is_VBZ that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN increase_NN of_IN smuggling_VBG ;_: but_CC that_DT may_MD be_VB due_JJ to_TO hearing_VBG of_IN more_JJR seizures_NNS ._.
My_PRP$ impression_NN is_VBZ that_IN scarcely_RB a_DT steamer_NN of_IN the_DT B._NNP I._NNP S._NNP N._NNP Company_NNP comes_VBZ in_IN without_IN some_DT ganja_NN ._.
The_DT company_NN do_VBP not_RB approve_VB ;_: but_CC the_DT stuff_JJ gets_VBZ on_IN board_NN their_PRP$ boats_NNS ._.
But_CC I_PRP have_VBP never_RB seen_VBN the_DT drug_NN used_VBN at_IN all_DT since_IN I_PRP came_VBD to_TO Burma_NNP ._.
From_IN my_PRP$ limited_JJ experience_NN in_IN Madras_NNP ,_, I_PRP feel_VBP difficulty_NN in_IN saying_VBG anything_NN definitely_RB ;_: but_CC ,_, gene-_JJ rally_NN speaking_NN ,_, I_PRP may_MD say_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ always_RB diffi-_JJ cult_NN to_TO interfere_VB with_IN the_DT intoxicant_NN of_IN a_DT nation_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ unwise_JJ to_TO do_VB this_DT without_IN very_RB grave_JJ necessity_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP further_RB that_IN there_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT physiological_JJ necessity_NN for_IN some_DT kind_NN of_IN artificial_JJ stimulant_NN in_IN the_DT human_JJ race_NN ._.
And_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT very_RB seri-_JJ ous_JJ matter_NN to_TO attempt_VB to_TO interfere_VB by_IN force_NN with_IN the_DT habits_NNS of_IN a_DT race_NN or_CC people_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO their_PRP$ stimulants_NNS ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB done_VBN with_IN the_DT greatest_JJS caution_NN ._.
50_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN SAW_NNP MAUNG_NNP ,_, ex-Sawbwa_NN of_IN Nyaungywe_NNP State_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
Fort_NNP Stedman_NNP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT Nyaungywe_NNP State_NNP ._.
The_DT State_NNP is_VBZ about_IN 60_CD English_JJ miles_NNS in_IN length_NN from_IN north_JJ to_TO south_VB by_IN 28_CD in_IN breadth_NN from_IN east_NN to_TO west_NN ._.
The_DT Danu_NNP country_NN borders_NNS on_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, and_CC some_DT Danu_NNP villages_NNS are_VBP within_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT capital_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP is_VBZ Nyaungywe_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ near_JJ Fort_NNP Stedman_NNP ._.
The_DT hemp_NN plant_NN ,_, bhen_NN bin_NN ,_, is_VBZ used_VBN but_CC little_JJ for_IN the_DT drug_NN ,_, and_CC principally_RB for_IN its_PRP$ fibre_NN in_IN the_DT State_NNP ._.
The_DT Shan_NNP people_NNS only_RB grow_VBP a_DT few_JJ plants_NNS here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT Palaungs_NNP ,_, Kachins_NNP and_CC Lawas_NNP culti-_JJ vate_NN it_PRP in_IN fields_NNS to_TO a_DT very_RB small_JJ extent_NN ._.
The_DT occa-_JJ sional_JJ plants_NNS grown_VBN by_IN the_DT Shans_NNPS are_VBP used_VBN for_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
The_DT more_RBR extensive_JJ cultivation_NN by_IN the_DT other_JJ classes_NNS is_VBZ for_IN the_DT fibre_NN ._.
Each_DT patch_NN of_IN this_DT cultiva-_JJ tion_NN would_MD be_VB less_JJR than_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN this_DT hall_NN (_( 60_CD by_IN 35_CD feet_NNS )_) ,_, and_CC nearly_RB every_DT house_NN would_MD have_VB a_DT plot_NN ._.
The_DT drug_NN is_VBZ not_RB made_VBN from_IN this_DT cultivation_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT plant_NN thus_RB grown_VBN for_IN fibre_NN is_VBZ called_VBN ``_`` gom_JJ bin_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT fibre_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT grower_NN and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB sold_VBN ._.
The_DT ``_`` bhen_NN bin_NN ''_'' and_CC ``_`` gom_JJ bin_NN ``_`` are_VBP precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ plant_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB if_IN the_DT male_NN plant_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN when_WRB the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ grown_VBN as_IN a_DT narcotic_JJ by_IN the_DT Shans_NNPS ;_: but_CC the_DT stem_NN of_IN 407_CD the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ split_VBN and_CC a_DT piece_NN of_IN wood_NN is_VBZ inserted_VBN ,_, and_CC ._.
a_DT chatty_NN or_CC other_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ suspended_VBN over_IN the_DT flower_JJR head_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT plant_NN growing_NN and_CC make_VB the_DT head_NN grow_NN thick_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT plants_NNS grown_VBN for_IN the_DT drug_NN are_VBP treated_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT chatty_NN remains_VBZ suspended_VBN over_IN the_DT plant_NN for_IN about_IN a_DT month_NN ._.
The_DT stem_NN is_VBZ split_VBN when_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ grown_VBN about_RB as_RB thick_JJ as_IN the_DT finger_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT plant_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN down_RP a_DT month_NN after_IN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB seen_VBN the_DT seeds_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN the_DT plant_NN growing_NN ._.
The_DT plant_NN grows_VBZ to_TO a_DT height_NN of_IN about_IN 7_CD or_CC 8_CD feet_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ propagated_VBN by_IN seed_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB heard_VBN of_IN the_DT seeds_NNS being_VBG consumed_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT head_NN and_CC its_PRP$ leaves_NNS become_VBP dried_JJ ,_, the_DT ``_`` séjouk_JJ ``_`` is_VBZ fit_JJ for_IN use_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT process_NN of_IN preparing_VBG the_DT flower_JJR head_NN for_IN storage_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ stored_VBN as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ gathered_VBN ._.
No_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN below_IN the_DT incision_NN is_VBZ turned_VBN to_TO use_VB ,_, not_RB even_RB for_IN fibre_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT stem_NN is_VBZ crooked_VBN and_CC the_DT fibre_NN is_VBZ spoilt_VBN by_IN the_DT splitting_NN of_IN the_DT stem_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB the_DT head_NN contains_VBZ any_DT seeds_NNS ._.
About_IN six_CD or_CC seven_CD bunches_NNS or_CC heads_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN each_DT plant_NN ._.
The_DT branches_NNS of_IN the_DT plant_NN are_VBP pressed_VBN together_RB and_CC thrust_VB into_IN the_DT neck_NN of_IN the_DT chatty_NN ,_, which_WDT latter_RBR is_VBZ about_IN a_DT foot_NN in_IN diameter_NN ._.
The_DT chatty_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN mud_NN and_CC is_VBZ light_JJ ,_, but_CC baskets_NNS are_VBP generally_RB used_VBN ._.
The_DT chatty_NN or_CC basket_NN is_VBZ supported_VBN by_IN the_DT plant_NN it-_JJ self_NN ._.
The_DT bunch_NN on_IN the_DT leading_VBG shoot_NN is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT best_JJS in_IN quality_NN ._.
This_DT cultivation_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB found_VBN in_IN every_DT Shan_NNP village_NN ._.
Among_IN the_DT Shans_NNPS about_IN two_CD men_NNS out_IN of_IN a_DT hun-_JJ dred_JJ smoke_VBD the_DT drug_NN ;_: women_NNS never_RB smoke_VBD it_PRP ._.
The_DT drug_NN is_VBZ used_VBN in_IN three_CD different_JJ ways_NNS ._.
The_DT drug_NN is_VBZ cut_VBN into_IN shreds_NNS ,_, mixed_JJ with_IN tobacco_NN and_CC smoked_VBN in_IN the_DT cigar_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB washed_VBN or_CC prepared_VBN before_IN mixing_VBG with_IN tobacco_NN ._.

The_DT cigars_NNS in_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ smoked_VBN are_VBP very_RB small_JJ ,_, about_IN the_DT size_NN of_IN a_DT cigarette_NN ._.
The_DT smoke_NN is_VBZ inhaled_VBN into_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ._.

The_DT drug_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB smoked_JJ unmixed_JJ ,_, rolled_VBD up_RP into_IN a_DT cigar_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN it_PRP so_RB smoked_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT cigarette_NN is_VBZ half_PDT the_DT size_NN of_IN that_DT in_IN which_WDT the_DT drug_NN mixed_JJ with_IN tobacco_NN is_VBZ smoked_VBN ._.
The_DT ``_`` tanape_NN ''_'' leaf_NN is_VBZ the_DT covering_NN of_IN the_DT cigar_NN ,_, the_DT same_JJ as_IN that_DT used_VBD for_IN the_DT tobacco_NN cigar_NN ._.
The_DT drug_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB mixed_JJ in_IN curries_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB used_VBN medicinally_RB ,_, mixed_JJ with_IN other_JJ drugs_NNS ,_, in_IN treatment_NN of_IN debility_NN and_CC dyspepsia_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB used_VBN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN fever_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT protection_NN against_IN malaria_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB know_VB if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN dysentery_NN ._.

The_DT drug_NN in_IN small_JJ quantity_NN is_VBZ exhilarating_VBG ,_, but_CC in_IN large_JJ doses_NNS the_DT user_NN becomes_VBZ timid_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP heard_VBN that_IN ,_, taken_VBN in_IN excess_NN ,_, it_PRP causes_VBZ madness_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN a_DT man_NN become_VBN temporarily_RB mad_JJ from_IN an_DT excessive_JJ dose_NN ._.
The_DT man_NN is_VBZ frightened_VBN at_IN every-_JJ thing_NN he_PRP sees_VBZ ,_, and_CC therefore_RB I_PRP call_VBP it_PRP madness_NN ._.
Such_JJ a_DT man_NN will_MD scream_VB at_IN a_DT post_NN ,_, thinking_VBG it_PRP is_VBZ about_IN to_TO fall_VB upon_IN him_PRP ._.
He_PRP will_MD remain_VB in_IN this_DT state_NN for_IN five_CD or_CC six_CD days_NNS without_IN a_DT fresh_JJ dose_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB known_VBN any_DT one_CD become_NN permanently_RB mad_JJ from_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB heard_VBN of_IN any_DT other_JJ drug_NN being_VBG mixed_JJ with_IN ``_`` sèjouk_NN ''_'' to_TO increase_VB its_PRP$ strength_NN ._.
The_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT Danu_NNP villages_NNS within_IN the_DT State_NNP grow_NN and_CC use_VB the_DT drug_NN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN the_DT Shans_NNPS do_VBP ._.
They_PRP do_VBP not_RB grow_VB the_DT plant_NN for_IN fibre_NN ._.
I_PRP never_RB heard_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN being_VBG taken_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN drink_NN ._.
Since_IN the_DT Shans_NNPS are_VBP Buddhists_NNS ,_, all_DT intoxicating_VBG drugs_NNS were_VBD prohibited_VBN in_IN the_DT Nyaungywe_NNP State_NNP ._.
The_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN was_VBD only_RB allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB grown_VBN for_IN medicinal_JJ purposes_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT first_JJ offence_NN an_DT offend-_JJ er_NN would_MD be_VB lightly_RB punished_VBN ,_, on_IN a_DT second_JJ convic-_JJ tion_NN he_PRP would_MD be_VB imprisoned_VBN ._.
The_DT State_NNP did_VBD not_RB take_VB any_DT special_JJ steps_NNS for_IN enforcing_VBG the_DT prohibition_NN ._.
I_PRP used_VBD occasionally_RB to_TO punish_VB offenders_NNS myself_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT punishment_NN was_VBD always_RB very_RB light_JJ ._.

There_EX would_MD be_VB no_RB strong_JJ feeling_VBG against_IN such_JJ measures_NNS ,_, because_IN ,_, unlike_IN opium_NN ,_, the_DT habit_NN of_IN using_VBG hemp_NN can_MD be_VB easily_RB broken_VBN ._.
People_NNS would_MD smoke_VB tobacco_NN if_IN deprived_VBN of_IN hemp._NN ``_``

Evidence_NN of_IN KINWUN_NNP MINGYI_NNP ,_, C._NNP S._NNP I._NNP ,_, Prime_NNP Minister_NNP to_TO the_DT late_JJ Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN Burma_NNP ._.

Under_IN the_DT Burmese_JJ Government_NNP the_DT hemp_JJ drug_NN was_VBD under_IN prohibition_NN because_IN it_PRP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT things_NNS prohibited_VBN by_IN the_DT Buddhist_NNP religion_NN ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN was_VBD enforced_VBN by_IN light_JJ punishments_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT first_JJ offence_NN the_DT offender_NN would_MD be_VB warned_VBN ,_, and_CC surety_NN for_IN good_JJ behaviour_NN taken_VBN from_IN him_PRP ._.
For_IN a_DT repeated_JJ offence_NN the_DT offender_NN would_MD be_VB im-_JJ prisoned_VBN ._.
Offences_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN to_TO light_NN by_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN police_NN ._.
No_DT special_JJ orders_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT police_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT people_NNS knew_VBD they_PRP were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO indulge_VB in_IN intoxicating_VBG drugs_NNS ._.
As_IN Prime_NNP Minister_NNP ,_, I_PRP had_VBD no_DT personal_JJ connection_NN with_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB therefore_RB know_VB how_WRB the_DT prosecutions_NNS originated_VBD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP known_VBN people_NNS to_TO be_VB punished_VBN for_IN breach_NN of_IN this_DT prohibition_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT punishments_NNS were_VBD awarded_VBN by_IN the_DT Police_NNP Magis-_NNP trate_NN ._.
No_DT special_JJ law_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN was_VBD passed_VBN during_IN my_PRP$ tenure_NN of_IN office_NN as_IN Prime_NNP Minister_NNP ._.
The_DT cultivation_NN of_IN the_DT plant_NN was_VBD not_RB prohibited_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT prohibition_NN was_VBD against_IN the_DT use_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN the_DT plant_NN when_WRB I_PRP was_VBD young_JJ ,_, but_CC I_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO recognize_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT field_NN now_RB ._.
I_PRP never_RB heard_VBD of_IN 408_CD its_PRP$ being_VBG cultivated_VBN anywhere_RB in_IN Burma_NNP under_IN Burmese_NNP rule_NN ._.
I_PRP never_RB heard_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN being_VBG used_VBN in_IN the_DT palace_NN mixed_JJ with_IN tobacco_NN in_IN cigarettes_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ it_PRP was_VBD used_VBN ,_, but_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB it_PRP could_MD have_VB been_VBN ._.
I_PRP never_RB heard_NN of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG used_VBN by_IN any_DT servants_NNS of_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD some_DT natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP living_NN in_IN Mandalay_NNP under_IN Burmese_NNP rule_NN ._.
I_PRP never_RB heard_NN of_IN their_PRP$ using_VBG hemp_NN ,_, but_CC if_IN they_PRP broke_VBD the_DT laws_NNS they_PRP were_VBD dealt_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT British_JJ Resident_NNP ,_, The_DT prohibition_NN against_IN hemp_NN would_MD not_RB apply_VB to_TO them_PRP ._.
53_CD ._.
Evidence_NN of_IN MYOWUN_NNP U._NNP PE_NNP SI_NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, late_RB Town_NNP Magistrate_NNP of_IN Mandalay_NNP ._.
Oral_JJ evidence_NN ._.
I_PRP was_VBD Town_NNP Magistrate_NNP of_IN Mandalay_NNP during_IN the_DT Burman_NNP Rule_NNP for_IN seventeen_JJ years_NNS ._.
During_IN the_DT Burmese_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT person_NN who_WP drank_VBZ liquor_NN would_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN severely_RB :_: the_DT opium_JJ consumer_NN less_RBR severely_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT ganja_NN smoker_NN would_MD be_VB least_JJS severely_RB punishable_JJ ._.
Drink_NNP was_VBD most_RBS severely_RB punished_VBN ,_, because_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP takes_VBZ liquor_NN is_VBZ violent_JJ and_CC quarrelsome_JJ ._.
Ganja_NNP makes_VBZ a_DT man_NN more_JJR jocose_JJ and_CC not_RB violent_JJ ._.
Opium_NN is_VBZ more_RBR ex-_JJ pensive_NN than_IN ganja_NN and_CC more_RBR difficult_JJ to_TO give_VB up_RP as_IN a_DT habit_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD therefore_RB thought_VBD a_DT worse_JJ habit_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP also_RB that_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP uses_VBZ opium_NN becomes_VBZ a_DT lazy_JJ man_NN and_CC unfit_JJ to_TO do_VB anything_NN ._.
The_DT ganja_JJ consumer_NN does_VBZ not_RB ;_: and_CC a_DT man_NN does_VBZ not_RB get_VB into_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN smoking_VBG ganja_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN opium_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO be_VB unable_JJ to_TO give_VB it_PRP up_RP ._.
But_CC all_DT three_CD were_VBD prohibited_VBN ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN originates_VBZ in_IN religion_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT king_NN sanctioned_VBD it_PRP ._.
No_DT special_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO enforce_VB the_DT prohibition_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB people_NNS were_VBD found_VBN using_VBG the_DT drug_NN they_PRP were_VBD punished_VBN with_IN a_DT light_JJ punishment_NN ._.
The_DT police_NN might_MD find_VB them_PRP ;_: but_CC they_PRP had_VBD no_DT special_JJ order_NN to_TO search_VB out_RP the_DT use_NN of_IN this_DT drug_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP was_VBD the_DT practice_NN to_TO read_VB the_DT general_JJ prohibition_NN of_IN intoxi-_JJ cants_NNS every_DT month_NN at_IN fasts_NNS along_IN with_IN the_DT other_JJ moral_JJ laws_NNS sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
The_DT police_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD no_DT special_JJ orders_NNS to_TO search_VB out_RP such_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Only_RB if_IN people_NNS became_VBD noisy_JJ or_CC otherwise_RB attracted_JJ notice_NN the_DT police_NN would_MD interfere_VB ._.
One_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS of_IN prosecution_NN for_IN use_NN of_IN intoxicants_NNS might_MD occur_VB in_IN this_DT town_NN in_IN a_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN regarding_VBG the_DT use_NN of_IN ganja_NN would_MD not_RB extend_VB to_TO cultivation_NN ._.
Before_IN becoming_VBG Town_NNP Magistrate_NNP I_PRP was_VBD a_DT Commissioner_NNP on_IN the_DT southern_JJ border_NN of_IN Upper_NNP Burma_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD cultivation_NN ,_, but_CC very_RB little_JJ ._.
There_EX would_MD not_RB be_VB more_JJR than_IN a_DT plant_NN in_IN a_DT hundred_JJ houses_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT part_NN where_WRB I_PRP knew_VBD of_IN cultivation_NN being_VBG more_RBR extensive_JJ than_IN any_DT other_JJ ._.
I_PRP heard_VBD that_IN ganja_NN was_VBD also_RB imported_VBN from_IN the_DT Shan_NNP States_NNPS ,_, but_CC I_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB that_IN of_IN per-_JJ sonal_JJ knowledge_NN ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB speak_VB to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT use_NN in_IN the_DT country_NN generally_RB ._.
In_IN Mandalay_NNP perhaps_RB about_IN fifteen_NN or_CC twenty_NN in_IN the_DT whole_JJ city_NN were_VBD convicted_VBN of_IN having_VBG used_VBN it_PRP ._.
I_PRP mean_VBP fifteen_JJ or_CC twenty_JJ Burmans_NNPS ._.
Hindus_NNP and_CC other_JJ natives_NNS of_IN India_NNP use_VBP the_DT drug_NN much_RB more_RBR than_IN Burmans_NNPS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD always_RB obtainable_JJ at_IN shops_NNS where_WRB people_NNS sell_VBP medical_JJ drugs_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT prohibition_NN against_IN sale_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
